name: Kimpton Fitzroy London
description: At Kimpton Fitzroy London, we have stories galore to tell. From the outside, the palatial 19th-century landmark building, which occupies a full block in Bloomsbury, looks the part of grande dame. Inside are contemporary creature comforts like roomy, art-filled suites with views over Russell Square, and destinations restaurants and bars that'll take your breath away. Fitz's, a glamorous drinking den that keeps the cocktails flowing; Burr & Co; a casually cool coffee shop; the light-filled, foliage-adorned Palm Court; and Galvin Bar & Grill, a modern British restaurant by Michelin-starred brothers Chris and Jeff Galvin. All of these details beckon modern travelers to settle in, and stay a while.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Eldon Chambers London by City Living London
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 9 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Amenities This hotel offers designated smoking areas. Property Location With a stay at Eldon Chambers London by City Living London, you'll be centrally located in London, within a 10-minute drive of Trafalgar Square and London Eye. This hotel is 0.7 mi (1.1 km) from St. Paul's Cathedral and 1 mi (1.5 km) from The British Museum. name: The Moorgate By Cove
description: No description found

name: Strand Palace Hotel
description: Situated in Central London, Strand Palace Hotel London provides art deco accommodation with state-of-the-art facilities. It is located a brief stroll from Leicester Square, Trafalgar Square and West End Theater District. Hotel the Strand Palace London features an all-hours reception, as well as 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. For added convenience, it offers luggage storage, a ticket service and a concierge. After a day of sightseeing in the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all have ironing facilities and a laptop safe. Guests of Strand Palace are invited to experience British cuisine at Haxells Restaurant and Bar, or try American meals at Joe Allen. Guests can also enjoy a drink at The Gin Palace. Strand Palace Hotel is located in the heart of London’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Charing Cross and Charing Cross Railway Station are within a 10-minute walk.Revato

name: Arran House Hotel
description: Set in the heart of elegant Bloomsbury, this Georgian townhouse is just 5 minutes’ walk from The British Museum. Guests can enjoy Continental breakfasts, and free WiFi. Each bright room at Arran House includes an LCD TV, tea/coffee facilities and a hairdryer. Traditionally furnished, some rooms also include period features such as Georgian fireplaces. Guests can relax in the elegant TV lounge with satellite channels. From the property, ZSL London Zoo is 1.7 miles away and Madame Tussauds London is a 25-minute walk away. Euston Square Underground Station is just a 5-minute walk away, while King’s Cross Station is a 15-minute walk. Regent’s Park and Oxford Street are both 15 minutes away on foot.

name: Thistle London Park Lane
description: Thistle Park Lane previously known as Great Cumberland Place - situated in an outstanding central London location on the crossroads between Oxford Street, Park Lane and Hyde Park. The perfect spot to stay if youre on a business trip or simply just experiencing London for leisure.Consisting of 119 bedrooms, including 5 apartments, a gym and a lounge, you can expect absolute comfort during your stay. Surrounded by great transport links, Underground stations linking you across the capital & the Elizabeth Line with a direct link to Heathrow & London.Located just down the road from shopping hotspots such as Oxford Street, Regent St and Mayfair, as well as a host of famous London landmarks including Madame Tussauds and fantastic views of Hyde Park, we can guarantee you wont run out of things to do during your stay with us.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel DC
description: Located in London, 3 km from West Ham, Hotel DC provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 3.2 km from Westfield Stratford City, 3.2 km from Stratford Tube Station and 3.2 km from East Ham. The hotel features family rooms. The hotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Staff at Hotel DC are always available to provide guidance at the reception. Olympic Stadium is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Snaresbrook is 5 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 7 km from Hotel DC.

name: Princes Square
description: Just 500 metres from Hyde Park, Princes Square offers cosy rooms and a 24-hour front desk. The property is a 5-minute walk from Bayswater and Queensway Underground Stations. All rooms are comfortably furnished, with private bathrooms and satellite TVs. All rooms have tea/coffee facilities and a hairdryer, and some have flat-screen TVs. There is a great selection of international restaurants just a short walk away. Set in a Grade II Listed building, Princes Square is a 5-minute walk from elegant Notting Hill. Kensington High Street is a 15-minute walk away, and the Museum Mile is a 25-minute walk.

name: Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London
description: With a modern fitness centre and impressive city views, the 5-star Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire has luxury bedrooms and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel is situated on Leicester Square, in the heart of Theatreland. The sumptuous bedrooms at Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire have luxury marble bathrooms and Samsung Smart TVs with up to 300 channels in multiple languages. Rooms also feature Egyptian cotton bed linen, air conditioning, work desks, a mini bar, an in-room safe, iron and trouser press and tea and coffee making facilities.All bedrooms feature sustainable Noble Isle skincare products Leicester Square Kitchen showcases a selection of contemporary Mexican and Peruvian small plates with the finest wines and cocktails. The Hampshire Lounge Bar and al fresco terrace offers afternoon tea and light snacks. Guest can enjoy the convenience of the 24-hour fitness room. There are also 6 private meeting spaces that can host between 2 - 120 people. Situated in London’s lively West End, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from Covent Garden. Trafalgar Square's National Gallery and National Portrait Gallery are also within a 5-minute walk. Leicester Square underground station is a 3-minute walk from Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire. The Royal Opera House is a 10-minute walk, and Oxford Street is half a mile away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: The Hayden Pub & Rooms
description: Conveniently set in the centre of London, The Hayden Pub & Rooms provides free WiFithroughout the property and a terrace. The property is located 1 km from Portobello Road Market, 1.3 km from Paddington Station and 2.6 km from The Serpentine. The guest house features family rooms. All guest rooms at the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a safety deposit box. Guest rooms include a private bathroom, bathrobes and bed linen. Lord's Cricket Ground is 2.7 km from The Hayden Pub & Rooms, while Royal Albert Hall is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Beaverbrook Town House
description: With a stay at Beaverbrook Town House, you'll be centrally located in London, within a 5-minute drive of Hyde Park and Buckingham Palace. This 4-star hotel is 1.9 mi (3 km) from Big Ben and 1.9 mi (3 km) from Trafalgar Square. Make yourself at home in one of the 14 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring free minibar items and espresso makers. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and 40-inch plasma televisions are provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Harrods - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Hyde Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi Victoria and Albert Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Hyde Park Corner - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Cromwell Road - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi Imperial College London - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Green Park - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Park Lane - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Piccadilly - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Victoria Station Travel Information Centre - 1.6 km / 1 mi Science Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi Natural History Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi Apollo Victoria Theatre - 1.6 km / 1 mi Victoria Palace Theatre - 1.7 km / 1 mi Buckingham Palace - 2 km / 1.2 mi The nearest airports are: Heathrow Airport (LHR) - 24.6 km / 15.3 mi Gatwick Airport (LGW) - 64.6 km / 40.2 mi London City Airport (LCY) - 19.1 km / 11.9 mi Luton Airport (LTN) - 54.1 km / 33.6 mi Stansted Airport (STN) - 63.2 km / 39.3 mi Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and an elevator. Pamper yourself with onsite massages or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. At Beaverbrook Town House, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Valet parking fee: GBP 80 per night Offsite parking fee: GBP 80 per night (0.3 mi away) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Reservations are required for massage services. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.Ticket Package

name: Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London
description: Located on the South Bank of the Thames, Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London is set opposite the Houses of Parliament and Big Ben, on the South Bank. It is less than a 5-minute walk from the London Eye, the Aquarium, restaurants and theatres. There is a fully equipped 24-hour gym, a 15-metre swimming pool with a sauna and steam room. The large, contemporary air-conditioned rooms have modern amenities, including a flat-screen TV, large desk, minibar and safe. The hotel features the modern, award-winning Brasserie Joël and Ichi Sushi & Sashimi, which specialises in sushi and sashimi. The illy Caffè serves Italian coffee and pastries. Primo Bar offers live evening entertainment every night. The hotel is within a short walk from Westminster and Waterloo tube stations, offering links to the top attractions of the city.

name: Charlotte Street Hotel, Firmdale Hotels
description: Featuring design to reflect contemporary London life, Charlotte Street Hotel also boasts features of classic elegance such as period fireplaces and a wood-panelled library room. The hotel has its own brasserie whilst being only 5 minutes’ walk from the many bars and restaurants of buzzing Soho. Bedrooms feature artwork from the early 20th Century, and are styled with this period in mind. Classic prints and wallpapering accompany elegant beds and luxurious furnishings. Each en suite room comes with a TV, iPod docking station and a minibar. Charlotte Street Hotel features its own cinema room, 24-hour room service and a gym. Guests can relax in the drawing room or enjoy a drink in the Oscar Bar and Restaurant. The hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Tottenham Court Road Underground Station, providing links to the Northern and Central lines. The famous shopping stretch of Oxford Street is 2 minutes’ walk away, and guests can be at the British Museum in just under 10 minutes by foot.

name: Tower Residences by Blue Orchid
address: 13-17 Byward Street, London, EC3R 5BA, London, EC3R 5BA
description: Tower Residences by Blue Orchid provides accommodation within 3.9 km of the centre of London, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a dishwasher. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and shower. A microwave and stovetop are also provided, as well as a kettle. Popular points of interest near Tower Residences by Blue Orchid include Tower of London, Sky Garden and Tower Bridge. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Kensington
description: With the Gloucester Road subway station just across the road, our hotel is in a great location for exploring London. Located in the museum district, we are within a mile of Kensington Palace, Hyde Park, and the Natural History Museum. Knightsbridge luxury shops and eateries are just a mile away. Unwind in our private garden after a busy day.Hilton

name: 1 Hotel Mayfair
description: No description found

name: Hand & Flower
description: In the charming area of Hammersmith, this elegant hotel features uniquely styled rooms with iPod docks, smart TVs and stylish en suite bathrooms. Hand & Flower also offers British pub food and beers from all round the world. Housed in a historic building, the modern rooms at Hand & Flower come with a flat-screen TV, mini bar and Nespresso machine. Guests can benefit from a work desk and free toiletries in the bathroom. All rooms provide views of the city. The ever-evolving menu of Hand & Flower includes the staples of British pub food including fish and chips, rustic beef burgers, succulent sausages and delicious pies served all day. Hand & Flower is located directly opposite Olympia Exhibition Halls and metres away from Earls Court. Only a 5-minute walk from Kensington Tube and Train Station, it is an excellent base from which to explore the rest of London.

name: 3 Sloane Gardens
description: Providing city views and free WiFi, 3 Sloane Gardens provides accommodation well set in the centre of London, within a short distance of Harrods, Victoria and Albert Museum and Buckingham Palace. Units are equipped with a seating area with a flat-screen TV, a kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a shower. A microwave, a fridge and oven are also provided, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Natural History Museum, The Serpentine and Royal Albert Hall. The nearest airport is London City, 14 km from 3 Sloane Gardens, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Wembley Park Hotel
description: Attractively set in the Brent district of London, Wembley Park Hotel is situated 800 metres from Wembley Arena, less than 1 km from London Designer Outlet and a 15-minute walk from Wembley Stadium. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel has a garden and a terrace. Private parking is available on site. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Wembley Park Hotel rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Preston Road is 2 km from the accommodation, while Kenton is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is London Heathrow Airport, 19 km from Wembley Park Hotel.

name: Intercontinental London Park Lane, An IHG Hotel
address: 1 Hamilton Place, Park Lane, London, W1J 7QY
description: Situated at one of the capital’s most prestigious addresses, InterContinental London Park Lane presents modern luxury in the heart of Mayfair. Inspired by its location overlooking the Royal Parks, the hotel delivers elegant natural interiors and sensational dining options. The flagship InterContinental Hotels & Resorts® property combines authentically personalised service with a Concierge team that brings insider London to life.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Radisson Blu Edwardian Bloomsbury Street Hotel, London
description: Located just 100 metres from the British Museum and less than a 10-minute walk from Covent Garden and Soho. The 4-star Radisson Blu Edwardian Bloomsbury Street offers a gym, restaurant and free WiFi. Oxford Street shops are just 5 minutes away on foot, and West End is only a 10-minute walk. Rooms at Radisson Blu Edwardian, Bloomsbury Street feature a flat-screen TV, bed linen and down pillows. Each private bathroom has a shower and Noble Isle toiletries. Some rooms offer views of the skyline. Bloomsbury Street Kitchen invites guests and locals for coffees, cocktails and an exquisite selection of contemporary Mediterranean and Japanese small plates, served in a setting decorated with towering plants and aromatic herb bushes. The Elizabeth Line can be used to get to Tottenham Court Road Tube station, which is within a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while Holborn Tube station can be reached in a 8-minute walk. King's Cross St. Pancras train station can be reached in 15-minutes via public transport, and offers international rail connections. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 7.5 miles from Radisson Blu Edwardian, Bloomsbury Street. Guests can park with preferential rates at APCOA Covent Garden (1 Museum Street, London, WC1A 1JR), located only 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Please visit the hotel website to obtain more information for the rates. Please note, vehicles are parked at the owner’s risk and the hotel accepts no responsibility for loss or damage to personal property. Ensure you read the terms and conditions set out by APCOA before using their facilities.

name: London Plus Heathrow B & B
description: London Plus Heathrow B & B is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in London. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, are at hand. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like dressing room, closet, towels, carpeting, clothes rack. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as garden. London Plus Heathrow B & B combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in London unforgettable.Agoda

name: JW Marriott Grosvenor House London
description: Located on Park Lane in the heart of Mayfair, our distinguished 5-star hotel offers exceptional accommodation, epicurean delights and sweeping views over Hyde Park. A stone’s throw from Bond Street, Knightsbridge, Regent Street, Buckingham Palace, V&A, Natural History & Science museums and the West End, explore London and all it has to offer from our doorstep. Experience modern luxury in a place where you can be mindful and present and indulge in our inspired service and nourishing surroundings. Make yourself at home in our welcoming guest rooms and suites complete with plush pillowtop beds, elegant marble bathrooms, beautifully curated amenities and high-speed Wi-Fi access. Maintain your workout routine in our modern fitness suite or recharge in our sophisticated Executive Lounge. Savour delicious cuisine at JW Steakhouse, experience award-winning Afternoon Tea in our Park Room or meet with friends for cocktails and nightcaps at the Bourbon Bar.Marriott

name: Hyatt House London Stratford
address: 10 B Chestnut Plaza Westfield, London, E20 1GL
description: Located in Westfield Stratford City within easy access to the Canary Wharf and the City our modern studio and one - bedroom suites offer fully equipped kitchens, stylish living spaces and a range of complimentary conveniences including daily breakfast, access to the hotel’s 24/7 gym, bar and restaurant and laundry services. Central London can be reached in 20 minutes via tube from Stratford tube station, which is only a 200-metre walk away. The O2 Arena and Canary Wharf are both within 5 miles of the apartments.

name: The Kings Arms
description: The Kings Arms Hotel is steeped in history and looking over Hampton Court Palace to one side and the Bushy Park on the other. The hotel dates back to 1709 and all the rooms are all different in shape, size, aspect and design. Dine on the alfresco terrace, in the restaurant, lounge or cocktail bar where food and drinks are served throughout all day. Central London is a 40-minute train journey away, whilst Heathrow Airport can be reached with 30 minutes’ drive. A number of riverside restaurants and pubs can also be found just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: The May Fair, A Radisson Collection Hotel, Mayfair London
description: The May Fair, A Radisson Collection Hotel has been a luxury icon in London's most sought after address, since its doors first opened in 1927. The hotel enjoys some of the largest bedrooms in London including the iconic collection of suites. A 3-D cinema, tranquil May Fair Spa, 24 hr gym & adjoining Palm Beach Casino make it one of the city's most sought-after places to stay or visit. Just down the road from Buckingham Palace & Bond Street's exclusive jewellery stores, cafs & boutiques as well as Berkeley Street's world famous restaurants, its the perfect base from which to explore the fashion, art & culture that make Mayfair THE place to be for locals, celebrities & discerning business travellers alike. Green Park station is around the corner, providing easy access to Canary Wharf. From stylish doubles to luxurious suites each of the hotels bedrooms features elegant, contemporary dcor, decadent Italian marble bathrooms & luxury Vi-Spring beds with down pillows & 350 thread count Egyptian cotton bedding. All are equipped with free WiFi up to 150mbps on an unlimited number of devices & Samsung TVs offering up to 300channels in multiple languages. In selected suites, iPads let guests browse the hotels services & menus before ordering with the touch of a screen. The May Fair, Radisson Collection Hotel is a foodie heaven. The flagship restaurant of the award-winning Kitchens brand, May Fair Kitchen presents an intimate, secluded Japanese izakaya and Italian restaurant experience, hiding in the vibrant hum of Londons most iconic neighbourhood. May Fair Bar is a natural meeting point from early morning to late at night, often collaborating with renowned drink brands to host pop-up residencies within the space. May Fair Terrace provides a sleek, open-air enclave for drinks and cigars.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Rose & Crown Wimbledon
description: In the heart of Wimbledon Village, the Rose and Crown Hotel has air-conditioned bedrooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs with Sky HD channels, including Movies and Sports channels. Wimbledon tram, train and Tube stations are about 15 minutes' walk away. Guests can enjoy award-winning beers and freshly cooked pub meals in a relaxed environment. There is a heated patio terrace for outdoor meals and drinks. The 17th-century Rose and Crown is walking distance from the site of the Wimbledon tennis championship.

name: Number Sixteen Hotel, Firmdale Hotels
description: Featuring ultra-chic interiors and a private garden, Number Sixteen offers glamorous accommodation in cosmopolitan South Kensington. The Victorian property provides 24-hour room service, minibars and iPod docking stations in the rooms. Each individually styled room reflects the contemporary design of the hotel, with luxurious fabrics and furnishings and hints of bold colour. All rooms at Number Sixteen are air-conditioned and feature flat-screen satellite TV. Some rooms have French windows leading to a small balcony. Afternoon tea is served all day at the hotel, and can be taken in the garden, conservatory, drawing room or library. Guests have a number of public rooms within the hotel in which to relax after a day outside in bustling London. South Kensington Underground Station is a 3-minute walk away, and is surrounded by bars, shops and restaurants. Located on the Picadilly, Circle and District lines, the hotel has easy Underground links to many parts of the city.

name: The Hoxton Shoreditch
description: Less than 1 mile from Londons Liverpool Street, The Hoxton, Shoreditch has 210 cleverly designed bedrooms featuring everything you need and nothing that you don't. All rooms come with flat-screen TVs with pay-per-view movies, Roberts DAB radios, tea and coffee making facilities, with fresh milk and mineral water and a free newspaper. Free Wifi is available throughout and complimentary light breakfast bags are delivered direct to rooms.The Hoxton also offers free printing and faxing services, along with up to 1 hour per day of complimentary phone calls to the UK, USA, Australia, and most of Europe. The Hoxton Grill restaurant, run in partnership with the Soho House group, serves American grub from breakfast through to supper and The Apartment, a meeting and events space like no other can host events of up to 250 guestsiHotelier/iStay

name: The Beaufort
description: This boutique luxury townhouse sits in a quiet, leafy cul-de-sac, a few minutes’ walk from Harrods. It offers complimentary water, soft drinks and tea and coffee served to your room, as well as free Wi-Fi. With a worldwide reputation, the Beaufort enjoys lavish facilities in a fashionable location at the heart of Knightsbridge. The hotel has exclusive shopping on its doorstep and is just 3 minutes’ walk from Knightsbridge London Underground station. Rooms include marble shower rooms and Egyptian linen. Welcome trays with mineral water and chocolates are provided, along with bathrobes and luxury toiletries. Fresh flowers and original English watercolour paintings decorate the airy rooms and suites. All rooms have full room service and free Wi-Fi. Guests can also enjoy marble bathrooms, quality carpets and soft easy chairs. In the Italian-designed drawing room you can enjoy complimentary soft drinks, cream tea with home made scones and coffee from the bar.

name: The Milestone Hotel
description: Ideally located between central London's Knightsbridge and Kensington districts, the boutique 5-star Milestone Hotel Kensington boasts a resistance pool, a fitness centre, and a luxurious spa. Overlooking Kensington Palace and Gardens, this intimate hotel is just 10 minutes' walk from leafy Hyde Park and the Royal Albert Hall. Individually designed, each air-conditioned room offers a romantic elegance, a 24-hour front desk, and modern technology. With antique furnishings, fresh flowers, and fine fabrics, the luxurious rooms include a flat-screen TV with a DVD player, a work desk, seating area, and a mini-bar. With free toiletries, the en-suite bathroom has a hairdryer. The daily room service includes a complimentary treat, such as sweets, homemade cookies, seasonal fruits, or candles. Guests at the unique Milestone Hotel Kensington can enjoy a range of traditional food in the onsite Cheneston's Restaurant. Dishes are prepared using locally sourced and organic produce wherever possible and the chefs encourage individual requests. The intimate Stables Bar offers a range of over 400 vintage wines. Guests can also sip cocktails in the chic conservatory or take tea by the fire in the lounge. Dating back to the 19th century, the Milestone Hotel Kensington is ideally located for designer shopping, sightseeing, and enjoying London's superb range of entertainment. The Victoria and Albert Museum is just 1 mile away and the world-famous Harrods Department Store is within an 8-minute walk.

name: Great Scotland Yard Hotel, Part Of Hyatt
description: The iconic Great Scotland Yard Hotel, part of Hyatt is located in one of the most prestigious and historical areas in London. Just around the corner from Trafalgar Square and moments away from the River Thames, Westminster and The London Eye. The hotel offers luxurious accommodation with a restaurant by Michelin starred chef Niklas Ekstedt, a hidden whisky bar, afternoon tea lounge, a fitness centre and event space that is unconventional. Light and airy rooms are tastefully decorated with delicate nods to the building’s history while being equipped with modern amenities including complimentary Wifi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and coffee making facilities. All hotel rooms have a private bathroom with a rain shower and locally sourced bathroom toiletries. The hotel offers a concierge, contactless room key entry, 24 hour room service and à la carte breakfast in The Yard made from best, local, British produce. Popular points of interest near the hotel include The National Gallery and Churchill War Rooms. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 14 km from Great Scotland Yard Hotel, part of Hyatt.

name: The Stafford London
description: Just off Piccadilly and next to Green Park, The Stafford London is elegant, central, peaceful and charming. Alive with English character, it holds 5 AA Red Stars for its excellence and offers free Wi-Fi. The Stafford London is ideal for West End theatres, dining, and shopping at Bond Street, Jermyn Street and Regent Street. Green Park Tube station and Victoria Station are within walking distance. Surrounded by art galleries and museums, the property is next the royal palaces and parks. Enjoy fine contemporary British cuisine in The Game Bird, the American Bar, with a 380-year-old wine cellar for private functions and 24-hour room service. Guests can enjoy afternoon tea by the fire in The Gamebird Lounge. The main house comprises three 17th-century town houses. A gym can also be found in the Mews. With an award-winning concierge service, The Stafford London offers rooms decorated in their own traditional style. Each boasts complimentary modern features and luxury bathroom amenities. Guests have a Bose Wave CD player, a satellite TV, a Nespresso coffee machine and a luxury private bathroom in every room.

name: The Resident Victoria
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, the hotel is situated in London, 300 metres from Buckingham Palace. Each room at the hotel includes a modern bathroom with bath or shower, as well as a hairdryer. There is a desk, a small kitchenette, as well as a laptop safe. Each room also has a Nespresso machine with free coffee included. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. St James's Park is 700 metres from the hotel, while Westminster Abbey is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 13 km from Nadler Victoria.

name: The Landmark London
description: In the heart of London’s fashionable Marylebone, this deluxe hotel has a stunning glass-roofed 8-story atrium with towering palm trees, an award-winning restaurant, luxurious bedrooms and an indoor pool and spa. The spacious air-conditioned rooms are decorated with fine fabrics and elegant furniture. They feature a flat-screen satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access and marble bathrooms with designer toiletries. At the Spa & Health Club guests can indulge in relaxing and therapeutic treatments including massages, reflexology and hot stone treatments. It also boasts a steam room, sauna, relaxation room and a fully equipped gym. Situated at the heart of the atrium, The Winter Garden offers fine modern cuisine, whilst Great Central Bar & Restaurant offers European dishes in sophisticated surroundings. Guests can also relax in the garden terrace and the Mirror Bar, and have free access to Spa at The Landmark London. Regents park and Lords Cricket Ground are both less than 10 minutes’ walk away. Marylebone Tube is 50 metres away, providing excellent access to all London’s attractions.

name: Canopy by Hilton London City
description: Our hotel is a short walk away from the world-famous Tower Bridge and the capital’s best markets, historic landmarks, and museums. Explore the city on our complimentary Canopy Bikes or walk two minutes to Aldgate Underground Station. Take the brand-new Elizabeth line to Liverpool Street Station and enjoy a leisurely ten-minute stroll to our hotel. We offer evening tastings and pet-friendly rooms.Hilton

name: L'oscar London
description: L’oscar London is a 39-bedroom hotel set within the former Headquarters of the Baptist Church. Set near Covent Garden, L'oscar London is in an location for experiencing the city. Guests can enjoy access to a range of boutiques, restaurants and cultural hot spots including Theatreland, the British Museum and the Royal Opera House. The rooms come with a flat-screen TV, a desk, a seating area and a private bathroom. All rooms have air conditioning and complimentary WiFi access. A la carte and Full English breakfast options are available each morning at L'oscar London. Royal Opera House is 600 metres from the accommodation, while Lyceum Theatre is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 12 km from the property.

name: The London Edition
description: Discover the new generation of luxury at The London EDITION. Located in a historic building on the outskirts of Soho, just moments from Mayfair and Covent Garden, our 5-star hotel embodies the boutique elegance and quiet confidence that is the cornerstone of Ian Schrager's philosophy. Immaculately appointed rooms and suites boast a nautical theme, as well as distinctive design accents, complimentary Wi-Fi access, rainforest showers and modern technology. Savour seasonal British specialties at Berners Tavern, Michelin-starred chef Jason Atherton's stylish restaurant, which features a private dining room for special occasions. You can also unwind with a drink at the modern Lobby Bar and the award-winning Punch Room. If you're planning a business or social occasion in Soho, you will appreciate our adaptable venues and superb catering services. Should you wish to explore beyond the hotel, the very best of London is right at your fingertips. We look forward to your arrival at The London EDITION.Marriott

name: The Resident Soho
description: With an excellent location, only a 2-minute walk from the Oxford Street, the hotel offers accommodation in elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi. Guests can benefit from a LED TV and free international digital newspapers. Each room at the hotel includes a modern bathroom with bath or shower, as well as a hairdryer. There is a desk, a mini-kitchen, as well as a laptop safe. Some rooms offer speakers in the bathroom, linked to the TV system. The hotel is located 400 metres from the Tottenham Court Tube Station and 850 metres from the British Museum. The London Eye is within 1.2 miles away. A host of bar and restaurant options can be found within a 5-minute walk of the property.

name: The Montague On The Gardens
description: The Montague On the Gardens Hotel London provides a cosy setting while in London. It is close to the British Museum, dining options and shops. This peaceful hotel provides an express check-in and check-out feature, valet parking and 24-hour room service. It has babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that operates 24/7. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a shower, cable/satellite channels and a flat-screen TV. They provide a desk, a seating area and an in-room safe. Montague Gardens Hotel's restaurants, Garden Grill and Blue Door Bistro, offer dinner each night. Each evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. London's well-known tourist spots are within close proximity to Montague Gardens Hotel London, with Central Saint Giles and Russell Square only minutes away. Guests can also discover Oxford Street.Revato

name: London Marriott Hotel Regents Park
description: London Marriott Hotel Regents Park offers everything you need to experience England's capital city in style. Ideally situated in North West London, just steps from Regent's Park and within walking distance of Lord's Cricket Ground and Wembley Stadium, our family-friendly and pet-friendly hotel effortlessly blends style, substance and award-winning service. Relax after a long day of meetings or exploring the city in our spacious, recently refurbished rooms and suites with pillow top beds and high-speed Wi-Fi; some of our rooms also offer private balconies. Stop by and enjoy delicious Italian dining at our on-site Carluccio's Restaurant or keep up with your workout routine in our fitness centre, pool and sauna. Our renovated event spaces are well suited to all business and social occasions, and our experienced event planners will help manage every detail. Best of all, our hotel location enables you to discover the many sights of London, from Camden Market and ZSL London Zoo to Primrose Hill and Baker Street.Marriott

name: COMO Metropolitan London
description: Located amongst a range of well-known tourist hot spots, boutiques and eateries, COMO Metropolitan London is ideal for guests wanting to explore London and its surroundings. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel, including body treatments, free Wi-Fi and a spa and wellness centre. Couples will delight in the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Guests staying at COMO Metropolitan London can enjoy the luxurious rooms that provide a private bathroom, a mini bar and a coffee maker. They all include a desk and an in-room safe. During their stay at COMO Metropolitan London, guests can dine at Nobu, which serves South American and Japanese cuisine. Each evening, guests are invited to relax in the lounge bar. COMO Metropolitan London is within walking distance of Bond Street, Buckingham Palace and Grosvenor Square. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Knightsbridge Tube Station, which allows easy access in and around London.Revato

name: St James Hotel & Club Mayfair
description: With an exclusive club and a restaurant, this stunning 5-star hotel is in the heart of elegant Mayfair. St James Hotel is popular with celebrities and former guests include Cher, Elton John, Liza Minelli and Sean Connery. The hotel is set in a grand period building, and has sumptuous decor throughout. The boutique bedrooms feature handmade silk wallpaper and a luxury Hypnos bed. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi, and the stylish bathroom has fluffy robes and toiletries. Guests can enjoy modern British dishes and creative, seasonal specials in Seven Park Place Restaurant. Set in a quiet street, St James Hotel and Club is a 15-minute walk from the Houses of Parliament and Westminster Abbey. Street parking is available, and Piccadilly Circus is 600 metres away.

name: citizenM Tower of London
description: citizenM Tower of London is located directly above Tower Hill Underground Station. Offering spectacular views on the river Thames, Tower of London and Tower Bridge, citizenM offers 370 luxury fitted rooms and a food and beverages available 24/7. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With the room iPad, or the free citizenM app, all guests can control room lights, black-out blinds, curtains, temperature, as well as TV and radio channels. They can also stream from their own Netflix, Prime or Disney+ accounts (and many others), by connecting their phone, tablet or laptop to the TV via Chromecast (at no extra charge). Some rooms feature views of the Tower of London/ the Shard or the London skyline. citizenM provides free super-fast WiFi, a power rain shower, and safe/mini fridge (filled with free water). A breakfast buffet is available each morning at the property. The hotel provides rooftop meeting room space with views over the Tower of London and the river Thames. The Tower of London is 50 metres from citizenM Tower of London, while Tower Bridge is 200 metres away. London City Airport is 7 miles from the property.

name: The Marylebone Hotel
description: The Marylebone Hotel is within 500 metres from Bond Street Underground Station and the shops of Oxford Street including Selfridges, John Lewis and the designer boutiques of Bond Street. It offers complimentary access to a state-of-the-art gym, 18-metre swimming pool and fitness classes. Luxury bedding, fluffy bathrobes and slippers, free WiFi, and a flat-screen TV are featured in each room at The Marylebone. Malin & Goetz toiletries, tea, coffee and water are also included. 108 Brasserie and 108 Pantry serve modern cuisine made with fresh produce from local suppliers, and provides 24-hour room service. The Marylebone Hotel is within a mile from Oxford Circus, Soho, and Hyde Park.

name: Great Northern Hotel, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, London
address: King's Cross St Pancras Station, London, N1C 4TB
description: London’s original railway hotel. Since 1854 we’ve been creating wonderful experiences for discerning travellers. In the heart of the vibrant Kings Cross area, we provide a welcome and stylish escape, a place to rest from your journey, and a luxurious and well-connected base to make the most of London and beyond. Every room evokes the magic and charm of the railway’s heyday, brought right up-to-date. Beautifully designed to emphasise space, comfort and the character of our building, they are cosy, restful and carefully considered. Our restaurants and bars are in tune with the ebb and flow of our location. Throughout the day we provide a vibrant space to meet & eat. As afternoon turns to evening, we’re the go to destination for cocktails, fine dining and a great night out.Marriott

name: The Wellesley, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Knightsbridge, London
description: Overlooking the Royal Hyde Park amidst the glamour of Knightsbridge, The Wellesley combines sophisticated luxury with captivating grandeur and uncompromising service. The bedrooms are beautifully finished with contemporary touches and elegant artwork that pays homage to the building’s Art Deco past. We have married luxurious expressions of deco grandeur with the personal attentiveness of a true boutique experience to create an exquisite jewel for the discerning traveller. Within these walls the spirit of freedom is celebrated – the freedom to be private and the freedom to savour the rare and the beautiful. Home to a selection of London’s most exquisite bars and restaurants, this Art Deco style hotel boasts the finest Italian food, outstanding service, stylish live music performances and a distinguished collection of the finest spirits and cigars.Marriott

name: Courthouse Hotel Shoreditch
description: Courthouse Hotel Shoreditch is located in London and offers a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. It also provides a sauna, a bowling alley and a swimming pool. This 5-star hotel offers 24-hour room service, a ballroom and a coffee bar. Welcoming and professional staff are available 24 hours a day. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Pool. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with top-of-the-range amenities such as luxury toiletries and a mini bar. They all have an in-room closet, a desk and a laptop safe. Those staying at Courthouse Hotel Shoreditch can enjoy a drink at Jailhouse Bar, after savouring a meal at Judge & Jury. The hotel is close to Old Street Station, making it easy for guests to explore London and its surrounding areas. Guests can also visit Brick Lane, Moorgate and Bunhill Fields.Revato

name: Karma Sanctum Soho
description: Ideally located in London's West End, the stylish Sanctum Soho Hotel features a rooftop garden with a 24-hour bar and the onsite Wild Heart Restaurant. Also boasting its own cinema and an outdoor hot tub, this boutique hotel is just 5 minutes' walk from Oxford Street's world-famous shops. Individually styled with a bespoke and edgy design, each air-conditioned room at Sanctum Soho has free WiFi and a plasma flat-screen TV with Sky channels. The rooms also feature a minibar and an iPod docking station. The modern en-suite bathrooms have Templespa. Open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, Wild Heart Restaurant features vintage-glamour décor and serves modern British cuisine. Guests can also enjoy afternoon tea, coffee, and cocktails. With a 24-hour service and access to the hot tub, the intimate Roof Terrace offers of an inside bar, a covered lounge with a fireplace, and a resident's area. Sanctum Soho Hotel is a 20-minute stroll from leafy Hyde Park. With easy 20-minute connections to iconic Westminster, Piccadilly Circus Tube Station can be reached after 5 minutes' walk.

name: The Dixon, Tower Bridge, Autograph Collection
description: Occupying an awe-inspiring building that dates from 1906, when it served as the Tower Bridge Magistrates Court, The Dixon is a hotel that captures all the culture, creativity and variety of London SE1. Named after John Dixon Butler, the Grade II-listed building's original Edwardian architect, The Dixon is steeped in history but inspired by the contemporary character and culture of its vibrant neighbourhood. Its 193 rooms and suites, lounges and restaurant enjoy an edgy, eclectic design aesthetic and a boutique vibe. Tactile materials, surprising bursts of colour and finely-crafted details effortlessly complement the authentic original features. This place exudes style and charisma, from top to toe – with staff who'll treat you as the individual you are. The welcome is warm, the cocktails cool and the food flavoursome. Thanks to its landmark location in one of the world's most cultural postcodes, London's greatest cultural experiences – from the Tower of London to Tate Modern are just a heartbeat away.Marriott

name: Sea Containers London
description: Located on the banks of the River Thames, Sea Containers London is in the famed Sea Containers House, just a 7-minute walk from the Tate Modern and Shakespeare's Globe Theatre. The hotel is also 15 minutes' walk from the London Eye, Borough Market, The London Dungeon and SEA LIFE London Aquarium. Sea Containers London boasts a riverside restaurant with outdoor seating, a cocktail bar, an agua spa, a rooftop bar and a terrace with panoramic views over London. Free WiFi is available for all guests. Decorated by award-winning designer Tom Dixon, each room features bespoke furniture, a flat-screen HD TV, air conditioning, dimmable lights and a minibar. The marble bathrooms are complete with either rainfall shower or bath. Extras include a media panel, Malin+Goetz toiletries and satellite channels. Many of the rooms feature river views, directly facing the Thames. Some also have a balcony. The on-site Curzon screens a range of new releases, classic matinées and family favourites in a bespoke 56-seat cinema from Friday evenings through Sunday. Waterloo Train Station is a 12-minute journey on foot and London Blackfriars Train Station is 8 minutes' walk away.

name: Grand Royale London Hyde Park
description: Situated just a short stroll from Queensway, this modern hotel features both a bar and a restaurant. It is located in London, surrounded by a range of well-known shops and is within a 10-minute walk of Lancaster Gate Tube Station. This 4-star hotel offers 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and a coffee bar. For families Grand Royale London Hyde Park offers babysitting/child services. The rooms are air conditioned and include a telephone and a flat-screen TV. Every morning, guests can wake up to breakfast served by Grand Royale London Hyde Park before heading off to see what the surrounding region has to offer. London's attractions, such as Kensington Gardens and Kensington Palace, are within easy walking distance of Grand Royale London Hyde Park. Notting Hill Gate, the Great Western Railway War Memorial and Kensington High Street are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Yotel London City
description: YOTEL London Clerkenwell offers 4-star accommodation in Central London. It also provides complimentary Wi-Fi. A 24-hour reception, luggage storage and an express check-in and check-out feature are just some of the available services at the hotel. A fitness centre is available to those wanting to keep active while travelling. The rooms are air conditioned and include a desk, a laptop safe and a flat-screen TV. After settling in to their room, guests can explore the area with use of Farringdon Station, which is moments from the hotel. Guests staying at YOTEL London Clerkenwell can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably based for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. The hotel also serves breakfast each morning. YOTEL London Clerkenwell is within walking distance of the Barbican Centre, Fleet Street and London Stock Exchange. It is within a 20-minute stroll of St Paul's Tube Station, which allows easy access in and around London.Revato

name: The Rubens at the Palace
description: The Rubens At The Palace is set in London and is within a 10-minute walk of Victoria Coach Station. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This luxury hotel offers a range of amenities, including 24-hour room service, valet parking and conference rooms. A Wi-Fi connection is also provided. Guests staying at The Rubens At The Palace can enjoy the luxurious rooms that feature an alarm clock, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. They all include ironing facilities, a desk and heating. Those staying at the property can sit down to breakfast each morning at The Rubens At The Palace before venturing out to explore the surrounding region. London's well-known attractions are within close proximity to the hotel, with Westminster Cathedral only a brief walk away. Piccadilly, Buckingham Palace and Green Park are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Vintry & Mercer
description: Set 700 metres from St Paul's Cathedral, the five-star Vintry & Mercer in London offers a fitness centre and bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Sky Garden, Tower of London and Borough Market. The property offers a business centre and free WiFi. At the hotel, all rooms and suites feature a bespoke interior design and include a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, while some units at Vintry & Mercer also provide guests with a balcony. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The on-site restaurant specialises in British cuisine. Staff at the reception can provide advice on what to do in the area. London Bridge is 1.7 km from the accommodation. Mansion House station is a minute's walk from the property. London City Airport is 12 km away.

name: citizenM London Bankside
description: Situated in the heart of London, citizenM London Bankside is a stylish contemporary hotel, which is just a 2-minute walk from the Tate Modern, near Borough Market and only 600 metres from the Millennium Bridge. Free Wi-Fi is also available. Guests can enjoy the modern, trendy bedrooms which feature ambient lighting with the room iPad, or the free citizenM app. All guests can control room lights, black-out blinds, curtains, temperature, as well as TV and radio channels. They can also stream from their own Netflix, Prime or Disney+ accounts (and many others), by connecting their phone, tablet or laptop to the TV via Chromecast (at no extra charge). The en suite bathroom features a rain shower. The citizenM design hotel itself features a 24-hour reception and contemporary shared living areas furnished with Vitra fittings. Guests may also take advantage of the free iMac’s available to them as well as the complimentary printing service. The 24-hour CanteenM offers a selection of sandwiches and warm dishes and the bar serves draught beer, champagne and cocktails. There is also a breakfast buffet available, which serves coffee, tea, pastries and cooked English breakfasts. London Bridge is 500 metres away and Waterloo Rail and Underground station is less than a mile away. St Pauls Cathedral is located just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Thistle London Trafalgar Square
description: Situated in London, Thistle Trafalgar Leicester Square provides stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Leicester Square. It is located in the area's vibrant nightlife district, about a five-minute walk from Piccadilly Circus and Trafalgar Square. This modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and a concierge. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice spot to relax. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, an iPod docking station and tea and coffee making facilities. They each provide an in-room safe, an alarm clock and a desk. For those who wish to stay close by, the modern restaurant is a great dining option, providing a range of British, European and vegetarian cuisine. Room service is also available during certain times. Thistle Trafalgar Leicester Square is conveniently located for sightseeing in London with Strand and Charing Cross within a 10-minute walk. It is a five-minute walk from Leicester Square Tube Station, allowing easy access to other parts of the city.Revato

name: The Goodenough Hotel London
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a Smart TV, as well as a coffee/tea maker and a garden. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a pillowtop bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Langham Court Hotel
description: The Langham Court Hotel is a 4-Star hotel, offering a accommodation in a central location. The hotel boasts a stylish French restaurant and the inviting Foley's Lounge Bar. Langham Court Hotel offers free WiFi, modern rooms with luxury marble bathrooms. The bright and airy bedrooms have free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Rooms also feature a hairdryer and tea/coffee facilities are provided. - Just a 10-minute walk from Regent’s Park, Langham Court Hotel is a 15-minute walk from Madame Tussauds. Hyde Park is a 20-minute walk, and historic Westminster is just 1.5 miles away. Oxford Circus is 500 metres away, and Covent Garden is a 15-minute walk.

name: Wellington Hotel by Blue Orchid
description: Located in Vincent Square, Wellington Hotel by Blue Orchid offers tranquil accommodation in the heart of Central London. The property offers free WiFi and is only 10 minutes' walk from Victoria Station, offering excellent transport links to Gatwick Airport and all areas in London. All the stylish rooms at the Wellington Hotel by Blue Orchid feature a modern en suite bathroom and a TV. Guests can enjoy their meals in the on-site restaurant or relax in the lounge. There is also a gym and 24-hours reception, security, porter and room service. Popular local attractions include the Houses of Parliament, Westminster Abbey and St James' Park, all within 15 minutes' walk.

name: Mercure London Bloomsbury Hotel
description: Mercure London Bloomsbury, located in the famous Bloomsbury area, with its wide range of restaurants, cafes and bars to suit all taste. This hotel is a great base for exploring the best of the West Ends shopping, Theatres and all of the prominent London tourist attractions. The British Museum, Covent Garden and Oxford Street are all a short walk away. The hotel is a few minutes walk from Holborn and Russel Square Tube stations with direct links to Heathrow and Eurostar via Russel Square.accorhotels.com

name: The Rembrandt
description: In exclusive Knightsbridge, this 4-star hotel has free Wi-Fi and elegant Edwardian architecture. The Rembrandt is opposite the V&A Museum and tube stations are nearby. All of the stylish rooms have a flat-screen interactive TV and a bed. Some of the rooms have a luxurious spa bath. Enjoy fine dining in the sophisticated Palette restaurant or relax with a drink in the glamorous 1606 lounge bar.

name: Great St Helen Hotel
description: Great St Helen Hotel offers accommodation in London. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom with bath or shower and free toiletries provided. A TV is also included. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Tower of London is 800 metres from Great St Helen Hotel, while Tower Bridge is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: The Prince Akatoki London
description: The Prince Akatoki offers tranquil accommodation in the heart of London within a short walk from Marble Arch and Hyde Park. The hotel is inspired by the traditions of Japanese hospitality and fuses the best of Japan and the western world to provide guests with a 5-star luxury experience. The rooms are beautifully designed with a minimal aesthetic, natural elements, luxury fabrics and colours. Each of the 82 rooms and suites features plush beds, an extensive range of premium amenities, complimentary WiFi and bathrooms with luxurious rain showers. At The Prince Akatoki, guests can dine at TOKii and enjoy seasonal dishes that feature the best of East and West cuisine. Guests can also indulge in a rare collection of whiskies and Japanese sakes as well as cocktails tailored by the best bartenders in The Malt Lounge and Bar. Marble Arch Underground Station is just a 2-minute walk away, for accessing the famous attractions of the city. Paddington Station is 1.3 km away and offers direct links to Heathrow Airport, via the Heathrow Express.

name: Sofitel London St James
description: Sofitel London St James offers five-star accommodation in the heart of London West End. This landmark hotel - consistently rated as one of the best in London - combines traditional British design with contemporary style that is unmistakably French. Located in a grade 2 listed building, the hotel features a restaurant, Wild Honey St James, The Rose Lounge, the St James Bar, a large choice of conference suites and an award-winning spa. Sofitel London St James is an entirely smoke-free hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Ambassadors Bloomsbury
description: Set in Central London, this relaxed hotel features free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and 24-hour room service. It is a short stroll from Russell Square and the British Library, and showcases views of London. This 4-star hotel provides a concierge, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. The rooms at Ambassadors Bloomsbury are air-conditioned and include an alarm clock, a coffee maker and a flat-screen TV. They come with heating, a desk and a radio. Ambassador Hotel Bloomsbury London provides a varied dining experience with Number Twelve Restaurant and Number Twelve Bar. Ambassadors Bloomsburry Hotel London is within walking distance of Tottenham Court Road, the British Museum and BT Tower, and has a range of shopping, dining and nightlife options on its doorstep. The hotel is positioned within a short walk of Russell Square Tube Station.Revato

name: St Martins Lane London
description: With stunning, innovative design located within London's Covent Garden, St Martins Lane London boasts stylish public areas and guest rooms created by Philippe Starck. Rooms feature striking floor-to-ceiling windows and benefit from interactive light installations and flat-screen HD TVs. There is complimentary access to gym and complimentary gym kit laundry. Free bicycle rental is also available from the hotel. Situated just off the lobby, The Den and The Restaurant are the perfect places to enjoy the new All-Day Dining menu, afternoon tea, or sip on a Gin & Tonic. Step into gourmet eatery EllaMia London for a perfect coffee and sweet treat. As day turns to night, seek innovative cocktails behind the façade of a boutique tea counter in Blind Spot London. Charing Cross Station is just a 5-minute walk away, while Covent Garden Market and The Royal Opera House are also just 5 minutes’ walk away. Leicester Square is less than 10 minutes’ walk away, and Trafalgar Square is less than 5 minutes' walk.

name: Oak & Poppy
description: Located in London, this welcoming apartment lets you experience it all. Let your feet make short work of the 10-minute walk to Hampstead Heath or easily tackle the quick 6-minute drive to Regent's Park. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of London by hopping on a metro at either Hampstead Underground Station, a short 6-minute walk away, or Hampstead Heath Overground Station, 8 minutes away. Luggage storage, a safe, air conditioning, and a desk are featured at this vacation rental. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the digital TV (streaming services available). Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, free toiletries, and bathrobes. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, and a dishwasher, as well as an electric kettle, a microwave, and cookware. And you won't have to pack extra clothes, because you'll also have an all-in-one washing machine and dryer. Other amenities include bed sheets, multilingual staff, an ironing board, and blackout drapes/curtains.Expedia

name: Wilde Aparthotels by Staycity Covent Garden
description: Wilde Aparthotels by Staycity Covent Garden is located on the Strand in the heart of the West End theatre district and just a few minutes stroll from Leicester Square and Trafalgar Square. All rooms include free WiFi, private bathroom, touch panel controls, 43-inch smart TV and fridge, while the studio apartments also feature a fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher, microwave and toaster. The Adelphi and Vaudeville Theatre are close to the property while the Royal Opera House is 400 metres away. The Savoy and Lyceum Theatre are also within walking distance. London City Airport is 14 km away and Leicester Square Station is a 7-minute walk away.

name: The Resident Covent Garden
description: Situated in the West End of London, just a few minutes walk to Covent Garden Piazza and Charing Cross station, the hotel features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Theatre Royal Drury Lane, Savoy Theatre and The National Gallery. Royal Opera House is 700 metres away. The Resident Covent Garden was recently accredited with Green Tourism's Gold Award for outstanding sustainable practices. All rooms come with an en-suite bathroom with a powerful shower, either as a walk-in shower, or a shower over bath and a mini-kitchen including a microwave, fridge, sink with BRITA filter water tap, kettle, free Fairtrade teas, and Nespresso coffee machine with free capsules. A TV, desk and USB charging points are also available in the room. The reception can provide advice on the area in order to help guests plan their day. Trafalgar Square is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Arts Theatre is a 13-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Victoria Inn London
description: No description found

name: Montagu Place Hotel
description: Discreet, quiet and stylish, this boutique hotel in Marylebone is close to Baker Street and just 0.5 miles from Regents Park. Elegant rooms have free Wi-Fi and luxury bathrooms. Montagu Place has a designer feel, with some rooms featuring free-standing baths, Molton Brown toiletries, and restored Georgian period features. The intimate bar is open until 10pm, and in the morning, a continental breakfast buffet is served, with fresh croissants, coffee and other organic and Fairtrade items. Guests have excellent transport links, with 3 Tube Stations within 10 minutes’ walk, and Paddington Station less than a mile away. Hyde Park and the shops of Oxford Street can be reached with just a 10-minute walk.

name: The Westin London City
description: The Westin London City boasts an impressive riverside location and spectacular views over London’s historic River Thames. Overlooking Shakespeare’s Globe and the striking Tate Modern, our luxury spa hotel offers 225 guest rooms, suites and residences impeccably designed with the Westin Heavenly Bed, sleek bathrooms and free high-speed Wi-Fi. Guests are invited to indulge in an array of Westin services and amenities. Experience Hithe + Seek, a stunning wine bar with panoramic London views and Mosaic, our convivial all-day dining restaurant. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee. For those planning a special event or meeting in London, take advantage of seven thoughtfully designed spaces including the hotel’s signature venue, the Westin Ballroom. The Westin WORKOUT® Fitness Studio is complimented by the Heavenly Spa by Westin featuring six therapy rooms, tranquil pool area and innovative thermal treatments. A 5-star hotel experience awaits you at The Westin London City.Marriott

name: Sofitel London Heathrow
description: The Sofitel Heathrow has direct access to Terminal 5 via a covered walkway. It has a modern health spa, a 24-hour gym, 2 bars and 2 restaurants. Central London can be reached with direct train services from Heathrow Airport. The hotel boasts panoramic views of the airport thanks to its location. All of the spacious air-conditioned bedrooms have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, a bathroom with separate bath and shower, and 24-hour room service. Guests can unwind and watch Sky Sports on a large TV screen in the Sphere Bar, or have tea and cakes in the Tea Salon. La Belle Époque restaurant serves fusion French cuisine in stylish surroundings and the Vivre Restaurant offers a menu of international cuisine. The 5-star Sofitel London Heathrow is 21 minutes from Central London by train from Terminal 5 Rail Station, which is a 5-minute walk away. La Belle Époque, our 2 AA rosette awarded restaurant, serves fusion French cuisine in stylish surroundings and the Vivre Restaurant offers a menu of international cuisine.

name: Sanderson London
description: With unique and stunning design, this innovative boutique hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Oxford Street. Its spacious, designer rooms boast fantastic London views, HD TVs, and Egyptian cotton sheets. Designed by Philippe Starck, Sanderson's rooms feature layers of soft curtains around each area. Calming landscape scenes are hung on the ceilings, while private bathrooms feature luxury toiletries. Sanderson London offers a variety of dining options within the hotel. Paired with artisanal cocktails, and visionary designs, Sanderson London has everything you need. At some 80-feet in length, and serving up a selection of fun cocktails, Long Bar is at the heart of the Sanderson social scene. Oxford Circus Underground Station is just 5 minutes’ walk away, while Covent Garden and Leicester Square are a 15-minute walk. The British Museum is only 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Fielding Hotel
address: 4 Broad Court, Bow St, London, WC2B 5QZ
description: The Fielding Hotel is situated opposite the Royal Opera House in the heart of Central London. With free WiFi, this 19th-century hotel is 5 minutes' walk from the famous Covent Garden Market. Each of the bright air-conditioned rooms at the Fielding Hotel offers a TV, a direct-dial telephone, and tea and coffee making facilities. The rooms benefit from an en-suite bath or shower room. Hairdryers are available from the 24-hour reception. The area surrounding the hotel is home to numerous eateries, ideal for breakfast, lunch, and evening meals. Convent Garden Tube Station is just 150 metres from the Fielding Hotel and offers 20-minute connections to King's Cross St Pancras Railway Station and guests can reach Leafy Hyde Park after a 10-minute journey.

name: Hilton London Angel Islington
description: The Hilton London Angel Islington is located in the heart of fashionable North London area Islington close to Kings Cross and with excellent access to Central London. The hotel is next door to the British Design Center (BDC). A five-minute walk takes you to Angel Tube Station. The Northern Line is one stop from Kings Cross St Pancras and EuroStar. This is a great location for business or leisure with a wide range of restaurants and bars nearby. The hotel offers a range of elegantly designed bedrooms and suites. Upgrade to an Executive Room or Suite and you can access our Executive Lounge. During summer 2019 the hotels ground floor underwent a transformational renovation program (complete Sept 2019). This includes a new lobby area, grab and go facility, improved Executive Lounge and new food and beverage offering. The Halo Bar and Restaurant opened during July 2019 and serves breakfast followed by an all-day menu for guests and residents. This is a great place to be and be seen offering signature cocktails and an exciting food menu celebrating international dishes. It specializes in sharing dishes and small plates. - The hotel's Angel Suite offers a small meeting solution with state-of-the-art equipment and flexible set-up options. - There is a 24-hour fitness room at the hotel which is exclusively for hotel guests. - WiFi is complimentary to Hilton Honors members. Sign up prior to arrival or ask one of our team to enroll you free of charge. Key Features: * Accessible location beside tube stations * Outside the Congestion charge Zone * WiFi throughout hotel * Halo Restaurant and Bar * Next Door to BDC * Car parking facilities beside hotel (chargeable) * Close to Kings Cross * Emirates Stadium and Tottenham Hotspur Stadiums are nearby All rooms come with: * Tea & coffee making facilities and biscuits * 42-inch plasma TV (with satellite, digital and pay TV channels) * Individually controlled heating and air conditioning * Work desk * Iron and board * Mini-refrigerator * Hairdryer * Laptop safe * US plug socket * Alarm clock * Bathrooms with a spacious walk-in shower or a bathtub and overhead showerHilton

name: The Goring
description: Just 0.5 miles from Buckingham Palace, The Goring offers elegant rooms, gourmet cuisine, and free WiFi. Guests have free fitness-club access, and many rooms overlook the large hotel garden. Boutique shops in Sloane Square are a 5-minute taxi ride, and within 1.2 miles are the Tate Britain and the Houses of Parliament. Guests are less than 5 minutes’ walk from Victoria Station, giving excellent transport links. The 5-star Goring presents spacious rooms with luxury décor, each featuring a seating area and a TV with films on-demand. Many rooms also have a private terrace. Guests can enjoy fine dining in the hotel restaurant where the chef uses carefully selected British produce. There is a range of wines to sample on the terrace that overlooks the private gardens.

name: Conrad London St. James
description: Set just steps from St James's Park, Buckingham Palace, and the Houses of Parliament, Conrad London St. James boasts a prestigious, historic facade and a classic, contemporary interior, which showcases stunning art and locally inspired design. The ideal location connects guests to iconic London landmarks and provides easy access to the City and major conference centres. The hotel's intuitive and personal service appeals to both today's smart luxury travelers and local clientele who came to dine or hold meetings in the inspiring setting. Inside you will find luxurious rooms featuring modern in-room technology and amenities, complete with spacious bathtubs and walk-in showers. Enjoy an elevated style of British cuisine by renowned Chef Sally Abe at The Pem restaurant, before sampling a pint of house draught from Meantime Brewery, or perhaps one of the selections of craft beers, wines and iconic gins in the Blue Boar pub. Savour a quintessentially English afternoon tea in the Orchard room, and enjoy innovative cocktails created by top mixologists in our glamorous cocktail bar The Hedgerow. Energize with the latest equipment in the 24-hour Fitness Center. With over 7000 sq. ft. flexible meeting space, state-of-the-art audio-visual technology and creative food, Conrad London St James is ideal for business events, conferences, and weddings.Hilton

name: Park Plaza London Waterloo
description: Offering a restaurant and bar, Park Plaza London Waterloo is located in London, a short walk from Lambeth North underground station and less than a 10-minute walk from Westminster Bridge and the London Eye on the South Bank. Guests can enjoy the on-site coffee bar. All rooms include signature beds, 48-inch smart LED TVs, Elemis bathroom amenities and complimentary WiFi. Superior Rooms and Studio Rooms have walk-in showers. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also features a large gym, sauna, steam room and indoor swimming pool. Houses of Parliament is 800 metres from Park Plaza London Waterloo, while Big Ben is also 800 metres away. Landmarks such as National Theatre, Tate Modern and Westminster Abbey are within walking distance. London Waterloo Station, offering connections to north London and the City, can be reached in less than 5 minutes on foot.

name: Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel
description: Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel welcomes you with spacious accommodation, modern amenities and an exceptional location. You'll find our hotel on the outskirts of Heathrow Airport, just a short distance from nearby attractions including Twickenham Stadium and within easy reach of Central London. Contemporary rooms and suites offer deluxe bedding, free Wi-Fi access, 24-hour room service and stunning views of the airport runway from soundproof windows. Additional perks throughout the hotel include a modern fitness center. We proudly offer several superb dining options - from global dining at Market Garden Restaurant to Starbucks® coffee at Cafe Cha. Those hosting an event near Heathrow will be thrilled with our well-appointed venues, including the pillar-free Westminster Suite - as well as comprehensive planning and catering services, an on-site business center and abundant on-site parking. Whatever brings you to the area, we know you'll enjoy your stay at Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel.Marriott

name: The Bryson Hotel
description: The Bryson Hotel offers accommodation in London, less than 1 mile from the British Museum and located on the border of London’s Square Mile. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms provide double beds and en-suite facilities with bathrobes and free toiletries. Additional amenities include a flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities and air conditioning. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy breakfast served in-room. Guests at The Bryson Hotel can reach central Oxford Street in 10 minutes on public transport, and the centre of London’s financial district is 1.2 miles from the hotel. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 6.8 miles from the property. Farringdon tube and rail station is 5 minute walk from the hotel.

name: Tribe London Canary Wharf
description: Located in Wood Wharf, a new neighbourhood of the ever expanding Canary Wharf, TRIBE Canary Wharf provides a bold alternative for the contemporary traveller. The design hotel is conveniently situated in the heart of Canary Wharf and less than 5 minutes fr om the respective underground and DLR station. It's perfectly located to take advantage of East London has to offer as well as being a convenient hub for those travelling on business or leisure.accorhotels.com

name: Montcalm Royal London House - City Of London
description: Situated in Central London, the hotel provides 5-star accommodation and a concierge, a 24-hour reception and a lift. It is located a short walk from the Barbican Centre, Moorgate and Bishopsgate. Rooms are air-conditioned and have top-of-the-range amenities such as a coffee maker, an iPod docking station and a pillow menu. They feature a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. Eateries at the hotel include Long Arm Pub and Aviary. The hotel is close to Liverpool Street Station and Old Street Station, making it easy for guests to explore London and its surrounding areas. It is also within walking distance of Lloyd's of London, Brick Lane and the Museum of London.Revato

name: The Bailey's Hotel London Kensington
description: Located in Central London, this hotel is a short walk from the Natural History Museum London. It has free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Gloucester Road Tube Station. This modern hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and highchairs. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service and a laundry service are available on request. The Bailey's Hotel London Kensington has 212 air conditioned rooms. Each comes with free tea and coffee making facilities as well as an en suite. Guests of The Bailey's Hotel London Kensington are welcome to experience Italian cuisine at Olives, or try Indian dishes at Bombay Brasserie. Breakfast is available daily and room service can be requested. Attractions near The Bailey's Hotel London Kensington include the Science Museum, Royal Albert Hall and the Victoria and Albert Museum. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in London.Revato

name: Moxy London Stratford
description: What makes Moxy London Stratford a boutique hotel at its heart? Is it the bright, open lobby layout paired with contemporary furniture, or the ''Plug and Meet'' communal areas providing modern, ergonomic seating, large writing walls and 56-inch televisions for presentations? Maybe it's the fact that all 294 bedrooms are equipped with 42-inch televisions, en-suite bathrooms and USB charging points? Our hotel in East London has an awesome design; compact yet spacious cozy rooms, a laid-back lounge, and a fun sports theme. Plus, nearby this Stratford hotel you can visit Westfield Mall and shop 'til you drop. Or, are you a bit more adventurous? You can test your fear of heights at the ArcelorMittal Orbit nearby. Moxy is for play. Food, snacks and drinks are available 24/7 from the grab-and-go bar, but you can also ask the bartender to mix you a colourful cocktail or pour you a local spirit before heading out to the nearby Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, or MSG Sphere.Marriott

name: San Domenico House
description: San Domenico House is a luxurious boutique hotel located only 5 minutes’ walk from Sloane Square and fashionable Chelsea. Bedrooms have en suite marble bathrooms and offer free Wi-Fi. Beautifully designed rooms are furnished with antiques, paintings and classical furniture, collected from around the world. Air-conditioned rooms feature seating areas, Smart TVs and large built-in wardrobes. Penhaligon's toiletries and bathrobes are provided in the luxurious bathrooms. Some rooms offer a balcony. There is a breakfast, lunch and dinner room service menu and a roof-top terrace is available for exclusive use of the hotel guests. Victoria Station, Buckingham Palace and Hyde Park are all just one mile away. San Domenico House is just under 40 minutes’ walk from Kensington and just under 15 minutes' walk from world famous Harrods.

name: The Westminster London, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: The Westminster London, an iconic hotel comprising of stylish and uniquely designed rooms. Like the location at large, The Westminster London echoes a lively but intimate setting, giving a sense of mystery and curiosity, leaving you with a feeling that there is more than meets the eye. Located in the heart of historic London, The Westminster is characterised by some of the most iconic landmarks of the capital. The Houses of Parliament, one of the world's most famous clocks, Big Ben and Westminster Abbey are just a short stroll away. An area rich in history and art, which has been home to some of the world's most legendary authors and political figures. The STK Westminster combines a Modern Steakhouse and Chic Lounge with a bustling bar scene, an inspired menu and a vibed dining atmosphere featuring its very own bowling alley.
