Bao Yum is a whimsical twist on classical bao, offering breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert bao, along with a variety of salads, soups, sandwiches and snacks.Hilton

name: Hilton London Olympia
description: Close to Olympia Exhibition Centre and the fashionable Kensington High Street, Hilton London Olympia is the perfect base for business or leisure. For those looking to host conferences and events, our dedicated events team will work closely with you to understand your needs. Kensington has many nice destinations to visit and things to do for all ages. From historic architecture and stunning art to hands-on activities for kids, we are in the perfect place to see it all. With excellent bus, train and airport connections close by, traveling further afield will not be a problem, which makes us a go-to destination for your next family break. Our rooms are designed with your comfort and convenience in mind, providing a place to unwind or catch up on work. Whether you are here on business or for a city break, we are here to help you make the most of your stay by offering fantastic dining and first-class services. We have everything you need for a truly memorable stay in the capital. Hilton London Olympia Hotel rates are now inclusive of all taxes.Hilton

name: Euston Square Hotel
description: Located in Central London, this hotel is just a 10-minute walk to BT Tower and Tottenham Court Road. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This modern hotel provides a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and a coffee bar. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, a laundry service and a wake-up service are available on enquiry. Euston Square Hotel offers rooms equipped with a power shower and heating. They all have a desk and an in-room safe. Guests are able to unwind with a beverage at Euston Square's bar and try European style food in the restaurant. There is also a range of breakfast options to choose from every morning. London Euston Railway Station is within a five-minute walk from Euston Square Hotel London, meaning it's easy to reach the centre and other areas of the city. Guests can also visit the British Museum, the British Library and Russell Square.Revato

name: The Ampersand Hotel
description: With its own Mediterranean restaurant and just a minute’s walk from South Kensington Underground Station, The Ampersand is a cosmopolitan hotel set in a large Victorian building. The hotel also has a gym and games room. The pillared foyer has a grand staircase lit by an elegant cascading chandelier. The downstairs bar area gives a sophisticated urban feel with its exposed brick arches, and a patisserie menu is available in the hotel’s drawing rooms. Bedrooms at The Ampersand are individually decorated with bold contemporary wallpaper designs and original Victorian features. Each room has a minibar, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and an en suite bathroom. As well as the hotel’s well-equipped gym, guests will have access to information regarding horse riding, private trainers and running routes. Within 2 minutes’ walk of the Natural History Museum and the Victoria and Albert Museum, Harrods and Hyde Park are just 15 minutes away by foot.

name: The Hari
description: Just 10 minutes’ walk from Harrods and the Knightsbridge area, The Hari London features an on-site fitness centre, an 80-seater Italian restaurant and a bar with an outdoor terrace. Buckingham Palace and the Royal Albert Hall are only 1 mile from the hotel. An LCD flat-screen TV, handy phones, on demand movie library and an iPad/iPod docking station, as well as individual artworks from artists such as Tracey Emin, Mario Testino and Juergen Teller, are featured in all rooms at The Hari London. Free daily newspapers are also provided. Rooms with disability access are also available. The hotel’s Italian restaurant, il Pampero, showcases traditional, homemade Italian cooking in a contemporary London dining setting and features a central bar area. It allows for both table and counter dining with a variety of cocktails. The museum district of South Kensington is a 25-minute walk away, and Hyde Park is just half a mile from the property. Central London can be reached in 4 minutes via tube from Victoria underground station, which is a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

name: 55 by Le Mirage
description: Attractively set in the Westminster Borough district of London, 55 by Le Mirage is situated 1.5 km from Paddington Station, 2.6 km from The Serpentine and 2.7 km from Royal Albert Hall. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 4 km from the city centre and 1.2 km from Portobello Road Market. At the hotel, each room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV. At 55 by Le Mirage rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, French and Italian at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Lord's Cricket Ground is 3 km from 55 by Le Mirage, while Olympia Exhibition Centre is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: The Hoxton Holborn
description: Located in Holborn just a short walk from Covent Garden, a 10 minute taxi ride from Kings Cross St Pancras and close to Oxford Street. The Hoxton, Holborn is housed within a Grade II listed building which, like the original Hoxton Hotel in Shoreditch, has bedrooms cleverly designed to maximise comfort, with everything guests need and nothing that they dont. There are four different room categories and all the guests receive a complimentary breakfast bag delivered to the room, a free hour of phone calls and free water. The hotel has a no RIP OFF policy, which means that there are no surprise added extras at check-out. Theres free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel and a destination restaurant and bar on the ground floor operated by Soho House Group, serving up good value American food. There is also a basement chicken rotisserie restaurant. The hotel also has excellent meetings and event facilities, The Apartment, which is themed around a warehouse apartment and can hold up to 250 guests.iHotelier/iStay

name: London Marriott Hotel Kensington
description: Book your stay at London Marriott Hotel Kensington, ideally located near London's best-known landmarks, including Kensington Palace, Royal Albert Hall, Hyde Park and the Victoria and Albert Museum. Recharge in our spacious modern refurbished rooms and suites which offer pillowtop bedding, flat-screen TVs, abundant natural light, ample desks, Wi-Fi and an array of entertainment options. Situated within a soaring, seven-story atrium, Cast Iron Bar and Grill serves contemporary British and international cuisine. Stop by the bar for curated craft beers, fine wines or coffee. With almost 5,000 square feet of intelligent, versatile venue space, coupled with expert planning and catering services, our hotel is perfect for your next meeting or social celebration. Just a 25-minute drive from Heathrow Airport and a 15-minute drive from London Victoria, our Kensington hotel positions you perfectly for business and leisure pursuits.Marriott

name: Gresham Hotel
description: Just 200 metres from Paddington Station, this good-value hotel is well located in central London. Rooms each have a private bathroom and Hyde Park is less than 10 minutes’ walk away. The many shops of Oxford Street are within 15 minutes’ walking distance. Just a mile’s walk or bus journey brings guests to Regent’s Park, Madame Tussauds and the vibrant West End. The Gresham is easily accessible from Paddington Station, with its main line and Tube services. Heathrow Airport is a 17-minute train ride away via the Heathrow Express Service. The rooms have a simple, functional decor, and there is free Wi-Fi in the communal areas. Ironing facilities can be requested from reception.

name: Radisson Blu Edwardian Kenilworth Hotel, London
description: Radisson Blu Edwardian Kenilworth, part of Edwardian Hotels London, is just 5 min walk from the British Museum, recently voted Londons most popular tourist attraction. The shops and cafs of Tottenham Court Road & Oxford Street are 3 min walk away, while Covent Garden & the rest of the West End can be reached in 10 min on foot. Holborn Underground station (10 min walk) gives direct access to the City Financial District, while the Eurostar connection to Paris & Brussels at King's Cross St Pancras station is only 15 min walk away. The hotels light, airy lobby makes guests feel instantly relaxed & at home, while the 24 hour fitness room is perfect for relaxing & revitalising. Guests in need of a private space can also choose from the hotels 8 meeting rooms, capable of hosting anything from an intimate meeting for 2 to a large-scale event for 110 people. From comfortable singles & doubles to spacious family rooms, all 186 of Radisson Blu Edwardian Kenilworths stylish bedrooms feature modern comforts, such as 350 thread count Egyptian cotton bedding, down pillows & Italian marble bathrooms. Cutting-edge in-room technology is perfect for work or play, including free high speed Wi-Fi up to 150 mbps on an unlimited number of devices & international sockets. For an extra dose of luxury & spectacular views across Londons skyline, guests can book one of the hotels four studio suites. Scoff & Banter serves a superb menu of traditional British cuisine using only the finest locally sourced, seasonal produce. Guest-favourites range from tasty classics like beer-battered fish & chips, shepherds pie & Eton mess, to indulgent afternoon teas. All are served in a stylish but relaxed, home-from-home environment, and can be washed down with a superb selection of wines and cocktails.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Exhibitionist Hotel
description: The luxury boutique Exhibitionist Hotel is set opposite the Natural History Museum, in the heart of South Kensington. Close by are the V&A Museum, the Science Museum, The Albert Hall, and the upmarket shopping of Knightsbridge, Sloane Street, Harvey Nichols and Harrods. The property is set in beautifully restored, 18th-century townhouses which combine original design and contemporary finishes including bespoke furnishings. The hotel features 8 galleries with frequently changing pieces of work displayed. All rooms have a walk-in shower as well as a bath tub and Anyah toiletries. The Spa Suite features its own private indoor hot tub, while the penthouse has a terrace with an outside TV. Staff are happy to help with your stay in London. A few minutes' walk will lead you to the area's famous museums, or South Kensington Underground Station. There are plenty of shops, restaurant and bars that you can reach on foot. Hyde Park is a 15-minute walk away. Our breakfast is Continental Breakfast. We serve both hot and cold continental items

name: H10 London Waterloo
description: Located in London, H10 London Waterloo provides modern 4-star accommodation, as well as free Wi-Fi. The various facilities this stylish hotel offers include a 24-hour reception, a coffee bar and meeting rooms. This cosy hotel provides luggage storage, a concierge and a tour desk. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The rooms at H10 Hotel London are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a laptop safe. Each have an alarm clock, an in-room safe and a private bathroom with a shower. H10 Waterloo features a variety of places to dine, including Three O Two and Circus. London's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to H10 London Waterloo, with the Young Vic and the Imperial War Museum just minutes away. River Thames is easily accessible by car.Revato

name: Park Plaza County Hall London
description: Situated on London's South Bank, this modern and family-friendly hotel is just a few minutes’ walk from the River Thames and London Eye. The Park Plaza County Hall London offers a bar, gym, and a restaurant. London Aquarium, Big Ben, the Houses of Parliament, the National Theatre, Westminster and Waterloo stations are a 5-minute walk away. The spacious rooms at Park Plaza County Hall feature Smart TVs, large work desks, and some rooms are equipped with microwaves. Guests can also make use of free Wi-Fi and 24-hour room service. Some rooms on high floors have views of the London Eye and the City of London. Atrio Restaurant & Bar serves Mediterranean cuisine and a full English breakfast is available every morning. The gym has a sauna, steam room and treatments.

name: Nobu Hotel London Shoreditch
description: Nobu Hotel London Shoreditch in London is just 800 metres from Liverpool Street Station. Free WiFi is available throughout. Each room at this hotel has floor-to-ceiling windows and a 55-inch flat-screen TV with Bluetooth, a traditional Japanese tea set and a minibar. Some rooms have views of the garden or city and include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Chef Nobu Matsuhisa created the menu for the onsite restaurant which includes a sushi counter, lounge, bar area and an outdoor courtyard. Brick Lane is 900 metres from Nobu Hotel London Shoreditch. Old Street station is only 5 minutes’ walk away, providing access to London’s attractions. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: The Mandrake
description: The Mandrake is a multi-award-winning, luxury lifestyle property in the heart of Londons Fitzrovia. Every aspect of The Mandrake has been thoughtfully curated and designed to offer guests a unique, immersive and truly unforgettable experience. With the culture and nightlife of Soho and the West End on our doorstep, and the shopping of Oxford Street only a stones throw away, The Mandrake is a perfect base to set off and explore all that London has to offer. Our 33 luxurious bedrooms include three opulent suites and an award-winning Penthouse. All bedrooms have been designed to cocoon and comfort with a provocative use of colour, texture and original works of art. Transporting you far from the streets of Fitzrovia, our destination bars, Waeska and Jurema, offer ethnobotanical cocktails unlike any others found in the city. Whilst our restaurant, YOPO, led by Executive Chef George Scott-Toft, is a South American inspired feast of culture and cuisine. The Mandrakes renowned fusion of art, culture and design, brings a varied curation of artists, performers, exhibitions and events through our doors; turning the hotel into an ever-changing backdrop for new talent to shine.iHotelier/iStay

name: Euro Hotel
description: No description found

name: Hilton London Euston
description: Set in a stunning Victorian building and located just moments from Euston Station, King’s Cross St. Pancras and Eurostar terminal, Hilton London Euston is the perfect base for your stay in London. You can easily enjoy some of the city’s popular areas like Regent’s Park to the west, Camden Market to the north and Covent Garden to the south. Nearby attractions include the British Museum and the London Eye. Feel right at home in the hotel's contemporary rooms, decorated in cool, calm tones. Get to work at the desk or relax in the marble bathroom. If you require more space, simply upgrade to a spacious deluxe room. Host a wedding or meeting in one of the seven event rooms, suitable for up to 120 delegates. Stay connected with WiFi and video conferencing. Savour the popular Hilton breakfast in Mulberry’s Restaurant, offering a natural and warm atmosphere that will ease you into your day. Watch the waiters weave around the ornamental pillars whilst serving at the Woburn Place Restaurant, this London hotel’s flagship restaurant. At the end of a long day, relax in the Woburn Place Bar & Lounge, which serves an appetizing array of snacks and drinks.Official Hotel Information

name: The Pelham London - Starhotels Collezione
address: 15 Cromwell Place, South Kensington, London, SW7 2LA
description: The Pelham is an elegant boutique hotel in the heart of South Kensington. It is located a short walk from the Natural History Museum and Kensington Gardens, which seem to have inspired the brightly colored interiors. Here one is surrounded by a romantic mix of elegant patterns and rich tones. It has long been considered among the most sophisticated places in London. Settle in and revel in the character of the wood-panelled drawing room and library. Make time for a little indulgence with an afternoon tea or a dinner at The Trattoria by Michelin starred chef Alfredo Russo. Step out and explore the boutiques and worldclass museums of Kensington.iHotelier/iStay

name: Citadines Barbican London
description: Citadines Apart'hotel Barbican offers modern self-catering apartments, a 2-minute walk from Barbican Underground Station and a short taxi-ride to London Liverpool Street Train Station. Citadines provide Classic Rooms, Studios and 1-Bedroom Apartments, each with a satellite TV, a Chromecast and a private bathroom. Free high-speed internet access is available to guests in the apartments. A fully-equipped modern kitchen features a microwave and fridge (excluding the Classic Room). It opens on to the lounge area, which has a dining table for guests to enjoy meals together. Citadines is a 5-minute walk from London's famous Fabric and Turnmills nightclubs. Attractions such as the Barbican Centre and theatre, Sadlers Wells Theatre and St Paul’s Cathedral are all within a 5-minute drive. There is a 24-hour reception and guests can make use of the photocopying and faxing facilities.

name: Hart Shoreditch Hotel London, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: 61 - 67 Great Eastern St, Hackney, London, EC2A 3HU
description: Shoreditch Hotel London, Curio Collection by Hilton is in the heart of stylish Shoreditch, home to art festivals, vintage boutiques, markets, and an abundance of international restaurants. The hotel architecture nods to the local area, with details such as a striking wrought iron and copper staircase hinting at the area’s rich industrial heritage. The lobby weaves together East London’s industrious and artisan history with the brand’s Arabic roots. Mahogany lights echo the carpentry factory past, and hammered copper details reminiscent of Victorian Shoreditch complement the softly rendered walls inspired by the sandstone of Dubai’s Old Town. Make yourself at home in a modern guest room with a rain shower, Smart TV, media hub, and queen bed. Our more spacious Superior Rooms have an espresso machine, bathrobes, and a work space, while Suites also feature a separate lounge area and two televisions. For the ultimate stay, select our One Bedroom Suite with a separate sitting and dining space. Our signature restaurant, Barboun, is an Eastern Mediterranean grill inspired by the flavors of Levantine coastal towns. For cocktails, backgammon, beer, and Turkish Coffee, try our bar, Tavla. Our Grab & Go serves all things coffee and patisserie. Our hotel has a 24-hour fitness center and meeting space is available for bespoke events and gatherings.Hilton

name: The Dilly
description: With a superb central location between Piccadilly and Regent Street, this historical central hotel features spacious, elegant rooms provide everything you need for a stay in the city center. Stylishly furnished, the spacious rooms at The Dilly feature private bathrooms with bathrobes and cozy slippers. Guests can enjoy free newspapers, as well as a refrigerator and 24-hour room service. The Dilly is just 10 minutes walk from the shops of Oxford Street and Bond Street, while Piccadilly Circus is less than a 5-minute walk. Leicester Square and Covent Garden can both be reached in 10 minutes on foot. The Health Club at The Dilly has a steam room, and guests can exercise in the state-of-the-art gym and squash courts. The Dilly also features a dance studio available for private hire or dance lessons. Terrace at The Dilly restaurant has an outdoor terrace overlooking Piccadilly. Afternoon tea is also served here with child-friendly menus for the whole family to enjoy. Experience the flavors of India at Madhu's restaurant located in the hotel's Oak Room. The Dilly has seven meeting rooms and event spaces. The hotel is unable to accept contactless payments. A physical card is required.

name: George Hotel
description: No description found

name: Half Moon
description: Half Moon is located in London, within a 10-minute bus ride from O2 Academy Brixton and has a garden. The property is set 4.1 km from Crystal Palace Park. Free WiFi is available. At the hotel, every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and Full English options. Guests can dine in the on-site restaurant, which serves a variety of British dishes. London City Airport is 12 km away.

name: Hilton London Hyde Park
description: The purpose built Coburg Court Hotel was first opened in 1907 and later changed to the Coburg Hotel in the early 1960's. It was created by D. Joseph, the man responsible for many of the superstructures of several Underground stations. Now occupying this iconic building, Hilton London Hyde Park is set in this Grade II listed traditional red terracotta-clad Edwardian Townhouse with a prime location overlooking Britain's most famous park at the entrance of Kensington Palace. In keeping with the hotel's tradition, guest rooms are elegantly designed with the modern traveller in mind with a classic twist. Whether it is shopping, sightseeing or business that brings you to London, we aim to create a warm welcoming and homely atmosphere. Conveniently located in Bayswater on the corner of Queensway, named after Queen Victoria, this townhouse hotel is adjacent to two underground stations, Queensway and Bayswater, servicing the central, circle and district lines, meaning all London's key destinations are within 20 minutes from the hotel. With London's favourite Royal Park situated right in front of the hotel, enjoy a jog or a relaxing walk in Hyde Park. Kensington Palace, Serpentine Lake and the Diana Memorial Fountain will all be very interesting places to visit if you are on a leisure trip. You will also reach the shopping district (Oxford Street) within minutes, and the hotel is within walking distance of Portobello Antiques Market and Harrods. The hotel offers relaxed dining in the Library Lounge at the hotel and is based in the bustling Bayswater District that is bordered by Edgware Road, Kensington and Notting Hill, which are all known for their international gastronomic influences. All 136 guest rooms and one meeting room for up to 30 guests have high-speed wireless internet access.Hilton

name: Knightsbridge Hotel, Firmdale Hotels
description: With a 24-hour front desk, this 5-star hotel is located in a quiet street in the heart of London. It offers valet and concierge services, and spacious bedrooms with Rik Rak by Kit Kemp bath products. The Knightsbridge Hotel offers 24-hour room service served in the guest rooms or in the ground floor library and drawing room, including afternoon tea. There are many bars and restaurants a 5-minute walk away. Individually and tastefully decorated, each room has a luxurious bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There is also a flat-screen TV with DVD player, and an iPod docking station. Hyde Park, Harrods and the international designer stores of Sloane Street and Brompton Cross are a minute's walk away. The Knightsbridge offers a car pick up service at a charge. The Royal Albert Hall, the National History Museum, the Science Museum and the Victoria and Albert Museum are within 1 mile of the property.

name: The Trafalgar St. James London, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: 2 Spring Gardens, Trafalgar Square, London, SW1A 2TS
description: Boasting a prime location in the prestigious Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea, 100 Queen's Gate Hotel London, Curio Collection by Hilton, is on the doorstep of iconic cultural attractions including the Royal Albert Hall, Natural History Museum, Science Museum, and Victoria and Albert Museum. Enjoy a leisurely stroll from our historic, Victorian-style hotel to Harrods, Notting Hill, Kensington Palace, Hyde Park, and the designer boutiques of Knightsbridge. Following a multimillion-pound refurbishment, guest rooms and suites at our Kensington hotel exude elegance and feature complimentary WiFi, electronic newspapers, flat-screen HDTVs with Chromecast, and bathroom amenities. Unwind in a stylish Deluxe or Luxury bedroom with upgraded amenities and additional space. For a unique experience, select a two-level Duplex suite, boasting a top-floor location. Enjoy a workout in our state-of-the-art gymnasium or host a small meeting in one of two elegant boardrooms. Our signature restaurant Cento proudly showcases the very best of traditional Italian cuisine. Breakfast and all-day dining can be enjoyed here, or unwind with a late-night drink in our concept cocktail bar ESQ. For a traditional Botanical Afternoon Tea or pre-theatre drinks in a sophisticated atrium setting, visit Botanica. 100 Queen's Gate Hotel London offers 24-hour room service so you can dine in the comfort of your room or suite, day, or night.Hilton

name: Covent Garden Hotel, Firmdale Hotels
description: Situated in the heart of London’s theatre district, Covent Garden Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Royal Opera House, and surrounded by some of London’s best restaurants, bars and nightlife. A fully equipped gym is on site, as well as a treatment room offering massage and beauty treatments. The famous areas of Covent Garden and Leicester Square are both a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and both feature tube stations. Oxford Street is just 3 minutes away on foot and is Europe’s busiest shopping street. Each air-conditioned room at Covent Garden Hotel features an en suite bathroom, flat-screen TV and a fully stocked minibar. Many rooms have views over London’s rooftops. A wide breakfast selection and fresh seasonal produce are served in the on-site brasserie, as well as afternoon tea. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail or glass of wine at the stylish bar or relax in the wood-panelled drawing room.

name: Club Quarters Hotel, St. Paul's
description: Next to St. Paul's Cathedral, this private and exclusive 4-star hotel offers free Wi-Fi and spacious air-conditioned accommodation in the heart of The City, London's financial centre. The Club Quarters, St. Pauls is a clean, quiet full-service hotel, offering guests the services of a members-only club. Guests have free use of a computer and printer, free bottled water and free use of the fitness room. The Private Club Room has complimentary newspapers, magazines, coffee and tea. The hotel also boasts restricted entry for greater security. Rooms are comfortable, elegantly styled and beautifully appointed, with all modern conveniences. The award-winning Côte Brasserie restaurant is a casual French-style bistro, offering fresh food and European wines. Room service is also available, along with multi-menu room delivery. Just steps from the River Thames, the hotel is only 650 metres from the Tate Modern art gallery, the Millennium Bridge and Shakespeare's Globe Theatre.

name: Bower House
description: Attractively situated in the Westminster Borough district of London, Bower House is situated 800 metres from Victoria Underground Station, 1.8 km from Westminster Abbey and 2.3 km from Big Ben. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. The property is 700 metres from Victoria Train Station, and within 2 km of the city centre. At the hotel, rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Popular points of interest near Bower House include Houses of Parliament, Churchill War Rooms and Buckingham Palace. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Mentone Hotel
description: Situated in a quiet crescent, this Grade II Listed hotel offers free Wi-Fi within the fashionable Bloomsbury district. King's Cross rail station is just a 5-minute walk away. There are tennis courts and picturesque private gardens opposite Mentone Hotel. All of the rooms at Mentone Hotel have private en suite facilities and a TV for guests to use. A full English breakfast is provided in the morning. Guests can visit the British Museum and a range of theatres, all within 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

name: Shaftesbury Hyde Park International
description: Located in London, Shaftesbury Hyde Park International provides stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Queensway. The various amenities this modern hotel features include luggage storage, porters and a 24-hour reception. This cosy hotel provides a number of facilities, such as a safe, room service and a car rental desk. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. Shaftesbury Hyde Park International provides 70 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Also included in the rooms are a hairdryer, an in-room safe and an ironing board. Those staying at Shaftesbury Hyde Park International can enjoy a satisfying breakfast each morning. Shaftesbury Hyde Park International is within walking distance of Notting Hill Gate, Kensington Palace and Kensington Gardens. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Lancaster Gate Tube Station and Paddington Railway Station, which allows convenient access in and around London.Revato

name: Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall
description: A comfortable central London hotel offering suites for longer stays with kitchens, free Wi-Fi and a daily buffet breakfast included. In a quiet street, Staybridge Suites® London - Vauxhall hotel offers apartment-style accommodation five minutes' walk from Vauxhall's bus and Tube stations, with fast connections all over the city. You can walk to Westminster within 20 minutes, where Big Ben and the London Eye can be explored. Albert Embankment and Tate Britain are both walking distance from the hotel. You can get to outdoor events or concerts on the South Bank on foot in 25 minutes. The open spaces of Hyde Park and the world-class collections at Kensington's Science Museum and Natural History Museum are 15 minutes' Tube ride away. You can hold meetings on site in The Den, a smart space for up to 14. A 52-inch TV with a wireless connection helps take the stress out of presentations. Major exhibition and sports venues like Olympia and The Oval are less than five miles away. You can get moving with a workout in the fitness centre. Stock up on groceries from The Pantry, open 24 hours a day, and prepare dinner in your suite's fully equipped kitchen. If you're up late, the free laundry is also open 24 hours a day. Don't miss the midweek Manager's Social, with free drinks and the chance to network with your neighbours.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: London Marriott Hotel Canary Wharf
address: 22 Hertsmere Road, Canary Wharf, London, E14 4ED
description: Refresh, rebalance and experience the benefits of brilliant travel at London Marriott Hotel Canary Wharf. Ideally situated on the waterfront, just moments from East London's most celebrated attractions, our family friendly hotel provides an excellent destination for work and play. The spacious rooms and suites are equipped with plush signature bedding and floor-to-ceiling windows with views of Canary Wharf and West India Quay. Manhattan Grill features a delicious daily breakfast and steakhouse favourites for lunch and dinner; G&Tea Lounge specialises in Afternoon Tea and craft cocktails. We feature a 24-hour fitness centre and a relaxing sauna. Other facilities include a full-service business centre and 19 versatile event spaces for meetings and social gatherings. Our hotel is convenient to local attractions including Canary Wharf, West India Quay, the East London Docklands, ExCeL London, The O2 and Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park. We look forward to welcoming you to London Marriott Hotel Canary Wharf.Marriott

name: Kings Boutique Hotel
description: No description found

name: Cove Cannon Street
description: COVE Cannon Street is set in London, 1.1 km from Tower of London. Tower Bridge is 1.4 km from the property. All units include a dining area and a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven. A microwave and kettle are also offered. Every unit features a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Towels are provided. Somerset House is 1.7 km from COVE Cannon Street, while Lyceum Theatre is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 10 km from COVE Cannon Street.

name: City London Hotel
description: Just a 10-minute walk from South Bank, City London Hotel offers easy acces by two elevators to modern rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Elephant & Castle Underground Station is a 5-minute walk away. Rooms at City London Hotel have bare wooden floors and free mineral water. All rooms have tea/coffee making facilities, fresh fruit and mineral water, a flat-screen TV, a fridge and a hairdryer. City London Hotel offers fast food and light snacks, and English breakfasts are served daily. City London Hotel is situated opposite London South Bank University. Tate Modern is just half a mile away, and Waterloo Railway Station can be reached in 15 minutes on foot. Southwark Underground Station is a 10-minute walk away. The famous London Eye is 20 minutes' walk away, and the Imperial War Museum is reached after a 10-minute stroll. The Ministry of Sound nightclub is 3 minute's walk away.

name: The Grafton Arms Pub & Rooms
description: Situated within 900 metres of British Museum and an 11-minute walk of Dominion Theatre, The Grafton Arms offers rooms in London. The property is close to several noted attractions, around a 12-minute walk from Oxford Street and around 1.1 km from Carnaby Street. The property features a restaurant and Prince Edward Theatre is 1.2 km away. Every room at this guest house is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms include a private bathroom and some rooms have a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Extras include bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. Old Compton Street is 1.2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: TheWesley
description: The Wesley Euston provides 4-star accommodation in London. Those staying at the property can also enjoy free wireless internet. This chic hotel provides family facilities, such as supervised child care/activities. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. They feature an in-room safe, an alarm clock and a laptop safe. In-house dining options include The Wesley Bar & Kitchen, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests can relax in the cosy lounge bar. The Wesley Euston is close to Euston Bus Station, making it easy for guests to explore London and its surrounding areas. Russell Square, Tottenham Court Road and the British Library are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Hazlitt's Hotel
description: In London's Theatreland, in the heart of the West End, this 4-star boutique hotel offers beautiful rooms with antique furniture and free Wi-Fi. There is a 24-hour front desk and a library lounge. The unique bedrooms at Hazlitt’s have sumptuous decor and elegant panelled walls. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, minibar and work desk, and the luxury bathrooms feature land&water toiletries. A delicious breakfast is served in the rooms and includes freshly baked croissants and coffee. Hazlitt's also offers an honesty bar. Built in 1718, Hazlitt’s features priceless antiques and historical features throughout. Details include chandeliers, Victorian baths and carved wooden beds. Hazlitt’s is situated just off Soho Square, 300 metres from Tottenham Court Road Tube Station. Oxford Street is a 2-minute walk away, and Oxford Circus can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

name: London Marriott Hotel County Hall
description: Embrace history and luxury at London Marriott Hotel County Hall, located in bustling South Bank. Our hotel is only steps away from London Eye, Big Ben and the iconic Westminster Bridge. Occupying London’s former County Hall, our hotel embodies the city's storied history and quintessentially British spirit. Take in views of the Houses of Parliament, Big Ben and the London Eye from our historic and iconic hotel. Our guest rooms and suites feature luxury bedding, pristine marble bathrooms and complimentary Wi-Fi;reboot in our gym and relax at our 25-metre indoor pool. Dine at Gillray’s Steakhouse & Bar, where you'll find over 100 gins and locally-sourced steaks from the artisan Browne’s butchers and enjoy award-winning Afternoon Tea in The Library. Dynamic business meetings and special events come to life at our hotel, which boasts 7,071 square feet of elegant space. Find a quintessentially British experience inside London’s most photographed destination.Marriott

name: The Beaumont
address: 8 Balderton Street, Brown Hart Gardens, London, W1K 6TF
description: Offering a popular restaurant, spa and fitness centre, The Beaumont Hotel is set in the prestigious London district of Mayfair. The original building dates back to 1926 and features an iconic, 3-storey high sculpture by the award-winning Sir Antony Gormley. The hotel offers free WiFi and easy access to London's shopping. Accommodation ranges from standard guest rooms with large king-size beds, to studios and spacious suites, all elegantly designed in Art Deco style with original artwork and antiques. Luxury bathrooms have black and white marble, heated floors. The hotel features Le Magritte Bar and The Colony Grill Room, which are popular with locals, while the Gatsby Room provides the ideal setting for afternoon tea or evening drinks. The hammam and spa offer grooming and relaxation treatments, and use of the gym, sauna and steam room is free for all guests. The hotel is in a quiet position overlooking a landscaped garden square. Selfridges is within a short walk, while Hyde Park can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. Theatres, art galleries and luxury shopping can be reached easily by Tube or car.

name: New Road Hotel
description: New Road Hotel offers accommodation in London, a 5-minute walk from the Royal London hospital and Whitechapel Crossrail station. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and Mr White's Chophouse Restaurant by Marco Pierre White. Some rooms feature a private bathroom with a hot tub. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms feature large flat screen Smart TV’s and rainfall showers. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. You can play billiards at this hotel, and bike hire is available. Brick Lane is 800 metres from New Road Hotel, while Tower of London is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 8 km from New Road Hotel.

name: Boundary Shoreditch
address: 2-4 Boundary St (Enter on Redchurch St), London, E2 7JE
description: Set in London and with Brick Lane reachable within 600 metres, Boundary Shoreditch offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Boundary Shoreditch every room includes bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving British, Mediterranean and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Liverpool Street Underground Station is 1 km from Boundary Shoreditch, while Sky Garden is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: ibis London Shepherds Bush - Hammersmith
description: Secure yourself spotless accommodation and an unbeatable city location: ibis London Shepherd's Bush positions you within a stone's throw of local attractions and handy transport links. And with a hearty breakfast spread each morning, free fibre Wi-Fi throughout, a modern, airy bar and restaurant, efficient tour-booking service, and plush Sweet Beds in every room, we've got you more than covered for the most relaxing, restorative London stay.accorhotels.com

name: Kensington Prime Hotel
description: Well located in the Kensington and Chelsea district of London, Kensington Prime Hotel is set 1.7 km from Eventim Apollo, 2.5 km from Natural History Museum and 2.8 km from Victoria and Albert Museum. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 400 metres from Olympia Exhibition Centre. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the hotel each room has bed linen and towels. South Kensington Underground Station is 2.9 km from Kensington Prime Hotel, while Portobello Road Market is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Ravna Gora
description: Less than a minute’s walk from Holland Park Underground Station and Notting Hill Gate, Ravna Gora is a period townhouse offering bed and breakfast accommodation. The hotel combines areas of traditional décor and chic city living. Executive bedrooms have a contemporary style, while other bedrooms are more classic in their decoration. The basic bedrooms have shared bathroom facilities, with access to free WiFi and a TV in the room. Portobello Market is just a mile away and Hyde Park is a 5-minute stroll from the hotel. Connections along the Central Underground Line provide quick and easy access to Oxford Circus and Liverpool Street Railway Station.

name: Rove Hotel London Paddington
description: No description found

name: Courtyard by Marriott London City Airport
description: Courtyard by Marriott London City Airport is 5 minutes walk from London City Airport and the DLR, making it a perfect location for those traveling on business and leisure. The hotel is also a convenient 9 minute walk to ExCel London. The DLR connects you straight to all of London's key transport hubs, The O2 Arena and Canary Wharf. The hotel benefits from 184 bedrooms, a bar and restaurant, a gym and three meeting rooms for up to 50 delegates. Settle into spacious rooms with luxury signature Marriott bedding, complimentary high-speed WiFi, bedside charging point, 55-inch Smart TV, walk-in shower and triple-glazed windows, ensuring soundproof serenity. Enjoy a full English breakfast, bar snack and drinks, lunch or dinner in The Kitchen & Bar at Courtyard - providing fresh locally sourced cuisine and tranquil space to unwind.Marriott

name: Hilton London Bankside
description: Featuring a stunning industrial design of bronzed metal, glass and layered brick, Hilton London Bankside places guests a stone’s throw from some of London’s premiere sites including Tate Modern, the South Bank and Borough Market. The local Bankside area is teaming with buzzing restaurants, bars and cafes as well as a storied history ready to be discovered. Attend a play at National Theatre or Shakespeare’s Globe, take in spectacular city views at The Shard and marvel at history in St Paul’s Cathedral. Corporate visitors will appreciate the short walk to the Financial District. Relax in a guest room detailed with contemporary furnishings and original artwork. For your comfort, all guest rooms feature air conditioning, complimentary WiFi, interactive LCD TVs and a work desk with ample outlets. Upgrade to an executive room for access to the tranquil Executive Lounge, including refreshments and business services. The hotel even features the UK’s first vegan suite where everything has been created from the finest natural materials. From the headboard made from pineapple leaves to the bamboo floor, each element has been designed to create a boutique, luxurious and welcoming experience. Enjoy seasonal menus with an innovative twist at in-house restaurant OXBO Bankside, perfect for a mid-week dinner with friends or colleagues or join the fun each weekend with OXBO’s famous bottomless brunch. Unwind with a cocktail or a gin and tonic, and savour some light bites in The Distillery Bar, a nod to the hotel building’s heritage. Maintain your exercise routine with the heated fitness pool and fully equipped fitness center which features a Peloton® Bike with toe cages.Hilton

name: The Barbican Rooms
description: Situated in London, The Barbican Rooms provides stylish, 5-star accommodation close to the Barbican Centre. It also offers free wireless internet. This modern hotel provides a hair salon, a beauty centre and massage services. Welcoming and professional staff are available 24 hours a day. The Barbican Rooms provides 55 rooms, each equipped with an iPod docking station, a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. Guests are able to relax with a drink at The Barbican Rooms's bar and try British style food in the restaurant. There is also a range of breakfast options available every day. Places of interest near the hotel include Saint Paul's Cathedral, the Museum of London and London Stock Exchange. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Liverpool Street Station and Old Street Station, which allows convenient access in and around London.Revato

name: Malmaison London
description: This boutique hotel in central London offers stylish bedrooms and free WiFi. Located in trendy Clerkenwell, it is just 5 minutes’ walk from Barbican & Farringdon Tube Stations. Chez Mal Restaurant delights, with a mix of traditional steakhouse and classic French brasserie. Each stylish bedroom has a flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi. Guests have a power shower and luxury toiletries in every private bathroom. This chic Malmaison is at the edge of The Square Mile district, 15 minutes by Tube from theatres in the West End. There is a wide range of bars and restaurants within a few minutes’ walk of the hotel. The Brasserie at the London Mal offers private dining and a menu of classic British dishes, made using regional produce. The bar stocks a range of beers, and serves signature champagne cocktails. Private dining and intimate booths are available.

name: W London
description: Located in Soho, W London owns the stage in the epicenter of the city’s cultural core. Plugged into the pulse of London’s energetic social scene, this is where louder-than-life Soho mixes with the glitzy West End. Tune-in to a contradictory lifestyle of RETOX/DETOX in one of the 192 guestrooms or suites, suited and booted in playful design with touches of cool Britannia. Mix and mingle over local DJs or innovative cocktails at The Perception. Energize at FIT, then recharge at AWAY® Spa before premiering your blockbuster in our Screening Room. Our Whatever/Whenever® service takes care of everything else.Marriott

name: Hilton London Paddington
description: Connected by footbridge to Paddington station, Hilton London Paddington is just a 15-minute roof to roof connection to Heathrow Airport via Heathrow Express. Hilton London Paddington offers a wide range of 422 guest rooms from standard to executive rooms and suites, including 59 premium rooms in the GWR Tower which includes executive lounge access. All bedrooms have free WiFi. The hotel also features fully equipped gym. Connected with Paddington Station and with four London Underground lines on the doorstep, the hotel is the ideal point to explore London. Head to Oxford Street and the West End just 10 minutes away. See Buckingham palace and stroll through nearby Hyde Park.Hilton

name: St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London
description: Experience the iconic St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London. Originally opened in 1873, the historic hotel welcomes guests with five-star amenities, spacious rooms and superb service. Every pet-friendly hotel room and suite combines a sense of elegant history with modern comfort and includes plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, Wi-Fi and inviting decor. In the heart of King's Cross, you'll appreciate our proximity to King's Cross Station, the Eurostar, Camden Town, Regent's Canal and the buzzing Granary Square. We are also near the Royal Opera House, The British Museum and Convent Garden. Enjoy expanded living rooms and access to exclusive amenities at our Chambers Club. Take advantage of our spa, gym and stunning indoor pool. Choose one of our exquisite venues for your event, be it a lavish London wedding or a small business gathering. Famous as a hotel wedding venue, each wedding package is supported by expert planning services, custom catering and audiovisual technology.Marriott

name: Chelsea Cloisters
description: Chelsea Cloisters By CAPITAL is set in London and is within a short walk of nearby attractions, including Saatchi Gallery. The multiple amenities this modern property offers include free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and a safe. This elegant property provides a lift and a laundry service. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. Chelsea Cloisters By CAPITAL has 5 apartments offering all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Chelsea Cloisters By CAPITAL is close to South Kensington Tube Station, making it easy for guests to explore London and its surrounding areas. The surrounding area is also famous for its shops and boutiques.HotelsCombined

name: Apex Temple Court Hotel
address: 1-2 Serjeants' Inn, Fleet Street, London, EC4Y 1AG
description: Just off bustling Fleet Street, this 4-star hotel is located in London’s historic Temple district. Boasting a variety of stylish rooms and suites with flat screen TVs and free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms, eateries, and a 24-hour gym free for guest use. There’s no place like it. Spacious and chic, every room is home to an en suite with a walk-in shower, Antipodes organic toiletries, Sky Sports and Sky Movie channels, a safe, air-conditioning, a Nespresso coffee machine and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms even feature a bath and/or balcony (subject to additional charge and availability). Cots and highchairs are available on request. Dine at the sophisticated Chambers Restaurant where you can take delight in every bite. Enjoy fresh, modern cuisine in atmospheric surroundings complemented by the dark wood furnishings and candle lit lanterns. Just across the courtyard lies The Amicable Society of Lazy Ballerinas, a chic Wine Bar with a carefully chosen wine list, selected mezze and charcuterie platters, and a list of small plates that’ll send your taste buds soaring. Plus, the private dining rooms offer an exciting selection of unique and exclusive spaces to wine, dine and entertain. With Temple Underground Station less than a 10-minute walk away, while City Thameslink and Blackfriars rail stations are both a 5-minute walk from the hotel, be well-connected when you stay here!

name: citizenM London Shoreditch
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, citizenM London Shoreditch offers accommodation in London, just a 3-minute walk from Shoreditch High Street Station. Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV, free toiletries, a hairdryer, wall-to-wall windows, mood lighting, an international plug system and black-out blinds. There is a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, which is open 24 hours a day. Old Spitalfields Market is an 8-minute walk away and Brick Lane Market is a 9-minute walk away. Old Street Station can be reached in just 10 minute by foot and Liverpool Street Station is just a 12-minute walk away. London Stansted Airport has direct links from Liverpool Street Station. A breakfast buffet is available each morning at the property.

name: Staunton Hotel
description: In London's West End, this beautiful Georgian townhouse is a 7-minute walk from Oxford Street. The traditional rooms feature free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a minibar. The shops and theatres of Covent Garden are within a 10-minute walk. Goodge Street Tube Station is a 4-minute walk away. All of the rooms at the Staunton feature cherry-wood furnishings, facilities for making tea and coffee, and a hairdryer. The marble en suite bathrooms have power showers for guests to use. The Staunton Hotel features a lobby with traditional décor, a period fireplace and leather sofas. A full English and continental breakfast are available each morning in the breakfast room. Staunton Hotel is a Grade II Listed property, and does not have a lift.

name: The Leonard Hotel
description: Located in Westminster, this relaxed hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Selfridges and Edgware Road. It is close to Oxford Street, eateries and shops. This modern hotel offers babysitting/child services, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. Wi-Fi is also provided. The Leonard Hotel provides 44 air conditioned rooms. Each has a bathroom that has slippers and bathrobes. Guests staying at The Leonard Hotel can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably based for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. It is only a short stroll from Marble Arch Tube Station, allowing easy access to the rest of the city. The Marble Arch is also nearby.Revato

name: Royal Lancaster London
description: The five-star Royal Lancaster London is renowned for its panoramic views over Hyde Park. The 411 well-appointed guestrooms and suites have luxurious and elegant dcor and are fully-equipped with modern facilities such as air-conditioning, satellite television channels, mini bars, en-suite bathrooms and power showers. During their stay, guests can dine in the award-winning Nipa restaurant, offering authentic Thai cuisine. Additionally Tony Page at Island Grill offers an alternative a la carte experience. Royal Lancaster London is one of Europes leading and most flexible meeting and banqueting venues. Its conference rooms have the ability to cater for all sizes of events, from small business meetings, to large receptions for up to 3,000 people. The hotel is only a few minutes walk from the bustling shopping districts of Oxford and Bond Street, London's West End theatres, museums and tourist attractions. Even Heathrow Airport is a mere 20-minute ride on the Heathrow Express from the nearby Paddington Railway Station.iHotelier/iStay

name: Eccleston Square Hotel
description: Offering beautiful interior design and state-of-the-art facilities throughout, the grade II listed Eccleston Square Hotel is also ideally located in central London, bordering Belgravia and Victoria. Hästen’s beds, known as the most comfortable beds in the world, are included in every room, as well as curtains, sound and the large 49-inch flat-screen TVs with Chromecast. It will also provide the guest with a full concierge service. Guests can also benefit from a Nespresso machine with complimentary Nespresso capsules and free Evian water. Free phone calls can be made inside of London landlines. The luxury marble bathroom includes a hidden TV in the bathroom mirror, massage showers and a 'smart glass' wall that turns opaque instantly at the touch of a button. This impressive hotel is set in a classic London square in Pimlico, with access to the gated square garden. Victoria Train and Underground Station can be reached in 3 minutes by taxi, or a 10-minute walk. A bar menu is available to guests throughout the day and evening, afternoon tea is offered free of charge from 1pm to 6pm.

name: Ruby Lucy Hotel London
description: Well set in the Lambeth district of London, Ruby Lucy Hotel London is located 1 km from Big Ben, 1.3 km from Houses of Parliament and 1.5 km from Westminster Abbey. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.7 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Waterloo Station. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Ruby Lucy Hotel London every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near Ruby Lucy Hotel London include Savoy Theatre, Churchill War Rooms and Embankment Underground Station. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square
description: Just off Trafalgar Square, Club Quarters has an elegant brasserie and boutique rooms with free Wi-Fi. The National Gallery and Nelson’s Column are a 2-minute walk away. Set in a grand building, Club Quarters Trafalgar Square has beautiful original features and opulent interiors. There is a 24-hour front desk, and parking is available nearby. The stylish, 4-star rooms have flat-screen TVs with pay-per-view movies and iPod docks. Rooms also feature air conditioning and a work desk, and each has a luxury private bathroom with free toiletries. Designed in Italian marble, Boyd's Brasserie serves a modern British menu and fine wines. Boyd’s Bar offers light snacks and beverages in intimate surroundings. Club Quarters Hotel Trafalgar Square is a 10-minute walk from the Houses of Parliament and Big Ben. Charing Cross Underground Station is 150 metres away, and Covent Garden is a 10-minute walk.

name: Park Grand Paddington Court
description: Established in 1900, Park Grand Paddington Court is located in Westminster. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This modern hotel offers an in-house fitness centre, 24-hour room service and meeting rooms. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Park Grand Paddington Court provides rooms equipped with a coffee maker, a flat-screen TV and a shower. They all include an alarm clock, a desk and heating. Park Grand Paddington Court provides a varied dining experience, including a stylish restaurant and a bar. The hotel is close to Paddington Railway Station and Lancaster Gate Tube Station, making it easy for guests to discover London and its surrounding areas. It is also within walking distance of Kensington Gardens, Edgware Road and Regent's Canal.Revato

name: Bedford Hotel
description: Situated in London, 600 metres from British Museum, Bedford Hotel features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is 1.3 km from Euston Station, and within 1.7 km of the city centre. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Bedford Hotel rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a Full English/Irish breakfast. Popular points of interest near Bedford Hotel include Dominion Theatre, Tottenham Court Road and Royal Opera House. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Edwardian Grafton Hotel, London
description: In London's buzzing district of Fitzrovia, Radisson Blu Edwardian, Grafton offers luxury, boutique accommodation on Tottenham Court Road. The stylish hotel has a modern restaurant and free WiFi. The sumptuous rooms are furnished with custom-made wall coverings and designer Italian chairs. All rooms have a Sicilian marble bathroom with complimentary premium skincare brand REN toiletries, Egyptian cotton bed linen and each features air conditioning. Guests can enjoy steaks and fresh lobsters from the Steak & Lobster restaurant. The bar offers a range of beverages and light snacks. A buffet style breakfast is available in the morning. The building of the luxury, 4-star Radisson Blu Edwardian, Grafton used to be the Aston Martin Owners Club. The contemporary hotel also has a compact 24-hour fitness centre, a 24-hour front desk and 11 meeting rooms, which can host 2-150 people. Radisson Blu Edwardian, Grafton is just 80 metres from Warren Street Underground Station. Lively Covent Garden and King’s Cross St Pancrass Railway Station, with the Eurostar to Paris and Brussels, are both a 15-minute walk away. Regent's Park is a 10-minute walk away, while Oxford Street and Carnaby Sreet are just 1.2 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Angel Kings Cross
description: Set in the heart of bustling, trendy Islington only short walk from Kings Cross St Pancras Rail Station, the home of Eurostar and Harry Potter platform. We are also outside of the Congestion Zone and conveniently a 10-minute drive from Arsenal Emirates FC, and a 20-minute drive to the new Tottenham Hotspur FC. We are also within a short walking distance of the Sadler's Wells Theatre and Business Design Centre. Our hotel features a restaurant, Marco Pierre White Steakhouse, a Fitness Centre, Wellness Room, Five Feet to Fitness Rooms, and every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.Hilton

name: Chelsea Guest House
description: No description found

name: DoubleTree by Hilton London - West End
description: The DoubleTree by Hilton London - West End hotel is ideally located in Londons historic Bloomsbury district, between Holborn and Russell Square underground stations. Our full service hotel offers business and leisure travelers the perfect hotel only a stone’s throw from the British Museum and walking distance to top attractions such as Covent Garden, the West End and the shops of Oxford Street. Heathrow International (LHR) and Gatwick (LGW) airports are easily accessible by tube, rail and bus. With its beautiful Edwardian facade, our newly renovated West End hotel retains its historic charm without sacrificing modern convenience. Inviting guest rooms, suites and executive accommodations include pampering bath amenities, generous work surfaces, Flatscreen TVs, our luxurious Sweet Dreams bedding and wireless high-speed internet access. In addition, our guests will appreciate: * A well-equipped Fitness Center by Precor * Concierge services * 24-hour in room dining After a days business or sightseeing enjoy a light bite, afternoon tea or evening cocktails at Bar 92, where you can watch the news or sporting events on our lounge TVs. Join us at The Level Restaurant for sleek and modern hotel dining, serving a selection of international cuisines. And dont forget to start the day right with our extensive Doubletree Breakfast Buffet. The DoubleTree Hotel in Londons West End enjoys a superior location between the Financial District and popular West End attractions and neighborhoods like Soho and the theatre district. Our Bloomsbury hotel is also close to many wonderful cafes and restaurants offering a variety of cuisines, from casual eateries to fine dining. Our hotel is also situated in close proximity to three colleges, including University College London. For business meetings, conferences, weddings and receptions the Doubletree by Hilton London West End offers attractive and flexible meeting room spaces, a professional banquet staff and creative menus. Whether you visit London for business, vacation or a family get-together, our friendly and attentive staff looks forward to welcoming you to Bloomsbury in the West End with our signature, warm Doubletree Chocolate Chip Cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Haymarket Hotel, Firmdale Hotels
description: In the heart of London’s theatre district, the elegant Haymarket Hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars, and is just next door to the Theatre Royal. Guests can enjoy a swimming pool, gym, and a spa with a range of treatments. Afternoon tea is served until 16:30, with delicious cakes, scones with clotted cream and jam, and a wide range of tea and coffee on the menu. Fresh, seasonal produce is used in the restaurant, and tapas is available at the bar. A flat-screen TV, iPod docking station, and writing desk feature in each room at Haymarket Hotel. Rooms also benefit from 24-hour room service and a fully stocked minibar. St James’s Park is a 5-minute walk away, and Buckingham Palace can be reached in 15 minutes on foot. The Houses of Parliament and Big Ben are all within easy walking distance.

name: The Chelsea Harbour Hotel and Spa
description: Located in London, The Chelsea Harbour Hotel provides free wireless internet and a gym. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This relaxed hotel provides a number of amenities, such as 24-hour room service, valet parking and an express check-in and check-out feature. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. It also has its very own wellness centre, The Blue Harbour Health Club and Spa. Guests staying at The Chelsea Harbour Hotel can relax in their stylish rooms that offer a mini bar, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. They feature a desk, an in-room safe and heating. The Chelsea Harbour Hotel is under a 30-minute drive from London Heathrow Airport and Chelsea F.C. is a short walk away. It is within walking distance of Fulham Broadway Tube Station, which allows for convenient access in and around London.Revato

name: Vilenza Hotel
description: Set in London, 2 km from Sky Garden, Vilenza Hotel features express check-in and check-out and free WiFi. The property is around 1.9 km from Liverpool Street Underground Station, 2.2 km from Tower of London and 2.4 km from Tower Bridge. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Brick Lane. All rooms are fitted with a TV with satellite channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The units have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. London Bridge is 3.2 km from the hotel, while St Paul's Cathedral is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 9 km from Vilenza Hotel.

name: The Level at Melia White House
address: Albany Street, Regents Park, London, NW1 3UP
description: Located in central London's Regent's Park area and 1.1 miles from London Zoo, The Level at Melia White House offers a unique and exclusive experience with a high-end status. Dating back to 1936, the Grade II listed property features a bar. The Level at Melia White House has welcomed many famous guests, including historians and key political figures. With prior arrangement, spa treatments can be enjoyed in the privacy of the rooms and personal trainer sessions can also be arranged. Each stylish and air-conditioned room at the 4-star hotel offers a flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station, coffee machine, and a pillow menu. Guests can also make use of an umbrella and bathrobes. The en-suite bathroom has luxury toiletries. Guests staying at The Level will enjoy the benefits of Lounge access with unlimited soft drinks and pastries, complimentary daily breakfast and an evening tapas reception with alcoholic beverages. They can also use personal meetings rooms for 1 hour every day for up to 4 people. The bar and restaurant provides all-day dining and a menu influenced by the the Mediterranean. Enjoy a cocktail or glass of wine in the bar whilst snacking on tasty treats. Oxford Circus shopping district is a 0.8 mile walk away.

name: Moxy London Excel
description: London is known for the bright lights and constant buzz; London Excel is the home of world-leading events all year through. And while sampling all that, you can stay at the Moxy London Excel, a stylish, affordable hotel within the heart of the city. Moxy is perfectly located close to the Excel Exhibition Center and London City Airport. Moxy combines smart service an up-to-date technology with a fabulous design. Enjoy food and drinks 24/7, our super-duper fast and free Wi-Fi. The lobby of Moxy is as buzzing as London Excel itself.Marriott

name: Oliver Plaza Hotel
description: Fully refurbished in May 2018, the Oliver Plaza Hotel is in a cosmopolitan area of Earl's Court and offers good-value rooms close to Kensington and Knightsbridge. Earl’s Court Underground Station is less than a minute away. The hotel is about 200 metres away from Earl's Court Exhibition Centre, and 20 minutes’ walk from the Victoria and Albert museum. Oliver Plaza is decorated with new furniture, and offers free Wi-Fi internet access throughout the building. Each room has a modern LCD TV with satellite channels, and tea and coffee facilities. The hotel has excellent public transport links to all major areas of London. Frequent buses are available on Earl’s Court Road, and there are shops and restaurants within a few minutes’ walk.

name: The Clermont London, Charing Cross
description: This hotel is located in Westminster, just a short walk from the London Eye and the National Gallery. Featuring views of Strand and Trafalgar Square, it also offers a wide range of facilities, including 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. This modern hotel provides a 24-hour reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. Corporate amenities include a business centre. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to explore the best of the local nightlife. After a day of sightseeing in the local region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature slippers, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. Enjoy a relaxing aperitif in the hotel's cosy lounge bar, then head to the restaurant for an evening meal. Alternatively, the local neighbourhood offers several bars and restaurants serving a range of varied cuisines. Local attractions near The Clermont London Charing Cross include Piccadilly Circus, Big Ben and West End of London. The surrounding area is also famous for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Garden View Hotel
description: Located in a garden square in London’s fashionable Kensington, the Garden View Hotel is 50 metres from Earl's Court. It offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. The non-smoking rooms at the hotel have wooden flooring and feature private bathrooms with a shower. Rooms include a hairdryer, safe, tea/coffee-making facilities and Freeview TV. Breakfast bags are prepared each morning for guests who have booked breakfast. The hotel has multi-lingual staff that can assist guests with transport arrangements and tickets for sightseeing tours. Fantastic shopping is available on Kensington High Street, which is a 15-minute walk away, whilst Knightsbridge and Harrods are 2 stops on the Tube. The Natural History Museum, Science Museum and V&A are also 2 stops on the Tube.There is a bus stop around the corner and the Earl's Court Tube Station is 200 metres from the hotel. we are cleaning the rooms daily.

name: Intercontinental London - The O2, An IHG Hotel
description: Welcome to InterContinental London - The O2, where luxury and timeless elegance converge in a stunning location on the Greenwich Peninsula, right next to the majestic River Thames. Immerse yourself in the unique experience of being positioned directly on the Greenwich Meridian line. Our breathtaking hotel boasts 453 beautifully appointed bedrooms, offering stunning views of The O2, the River Thames, and exquisite suites designed to exceed your expectations.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Millennium & Copthorne Hotels at Chelsea Football Club
address: Stamford Bridge Fulham Road London England Sw6 1Hs, London, SW6 1HS
description: Located in London, Millennium & Copthorne Hotels at Chelsea Football Club offers stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Chelsea F.C. Those staying at the property can also enjoy complimentary wireless internet. This modern hotel provides a number of amenities, including meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and 24-hour room service. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer assistance. Chelsea Football Club provides 231 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Hot drinks can be made with the provided coffee and tea supplies. Copthorne Millennium at Chelsea features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax at the end of an evening with a meal and a drink. Copthorne Millennium Chelsea is under a 25-minute drive from London Heathrow Airport and Earls Court Exhibition Centre is a short walk away. It is within walking distance of West Brompton Station, which allows for convenient access in and around London.Revato

name: Courthouse Hotel
description: This 5-star Westminster hotel provides views of the skyline and is a five-minute walk from Oxford Circus Tube Station. It also features an indoor pool and a sauna and unique views of London. Courthouse Hotel London treats guests to superior amenities, including a rooftop terrace and Sanook. Facilities include complimentary wireless internet and valet parking. The rooms at Courthouse Hotel London are air-conditioned and offer a laptop safe, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. Courthouse Hotel London boasts convenient dining options, including Asian dishes at Silk and Asian food at Carnaby. Each evening, guests are able to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the vicinity. The hotel is within walking distance of Leicester Square, the Her Majesty's Theatre and Oxford Street. Central Saint Giles and Piccadilly Circus are a short walk away.Revato

name: Hatton Garden Hotel
description: Ideally set in the Camden district of London, Hatton Garden Hotel is situated 1.7 km from Royal Opera House, 1.7 km from British Museum and 1.9 km from King's Cross St Pancras. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.2 km from St Paul's Cathedral, and within 2.3 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hatton Garden Hotel the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Lyceum Theatre, Theatre Royal Drury Lane and Dominion Theatre. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 13 km from Hatton Garden Hotel.

name: The Griffin Belle Hotel Vauxhall
description: Set in London, The Griffin Belle Hotel Vauxhall offers a restaurant and free WiFi, 2.4 km from O2 Academy Brixton and 2.5 km from Victoria Train Station. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Continental and Full English/Irish breakfast options are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. The Griffin Belle Hotel Vauxhall offers a terrace. Westminster Abbey is 2.6 km from the accommodation, while Victoria Underground Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 16 km from The Griffin Belle Hotel Vauxhall.

name: The Lanesborough, Oetker Collection
description: This 5-star hotel is in London's Knightsbridge and looks out over Hyde Park. It has air-conditioned luxury rooms and offers a personal butler service, free WiFi and an in-room tablet. The Lanesborough, Oetker Collection's traditional rooms mix 19th-century style with modern luxury. Many also have scenic views over Hyde Park. Additionally, guests at this hotel gain complimentary access to The Lanesborough, Oetker Collection Club & Spa which includes fitness, spa and well being facilities. The hotel's The Lanesborough Grill restaurant serves outstanding, creative food. Guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner here, with a wine and champagne list to complement the flavours of each dish. The Library Bar is home to an array of Cognacs, cocktails, wines and spirits, celebrating award-winning mixology and an unrivalled selection of pre-French revolution Cognacs. There is also a fitness room and beauty treatment facilities, and a unique cigar lounge with a collection of Cognacs and cigars. The Lanesborough, Oetker Collection offers complimentary calls to the US and Europe.

name: Holiday Inn Express London - Stratford
description: Explore London from our Modern Stratford Hotel The family-friendly Holiday Inn Express® London - Stratford hotel is a 10-minute walk from Stratford Tube and DLR station, where you can catch direct trains to London City Airport and the O2 arena. From Stratford International station, a 15-minute walk away, you can take high-speed trains to St Pancras station. You can also catch the fantastic new Elizabeth Line which can take you from Stratford straight to Heathrow without having to change. The landmark venues of Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park sports complex, and the towering ArcelorMittal Orbit sculpture are nearby the hotel. The restaurants, cinema and bowling alley of the expansive Westfield Stratford City shopping centre is located by the main station. Business guests are a 15-minute DLR ride away from the ExCel London exhibition centre. Host meetings at our Stratford London hotel for up to 80 people in the five flexible, air-conditioned spaces, with natural light and free Wi-Fi. Limited on-site parking is available on a first come first serve basis for a daily fee of £20. Set yourself up for the day with Express Start Breakfast included, served in the modern dining area, which is also open for evening meals. The open-plan lounge bar area is a great spot to chat with colleagues and friends over a glass of wine, or relax at the table with a pint of draught beer.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Imperial Guest House
description: Imperial Guest House is situated 400 metres from Hounslow Central underground station, 6.2 km from Heathrow, with a 10 minute connection via the tube. Central London is 30 minutes away on the underground. The property features free WiFi access and free private parking. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Some units feature a seating area for your convenience. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Twickenham Stadium is 3 km from Imperial Guest House. Hounslow railway station is 1.2 km away, with train connections to London Waterloo. The M4 motorway is a 10 minute drive from the propery.

name: Clayton Hotel London Wall
description: Tucked down Copthall Avenue, this 4-star city centre boutique hotel. In the heart of the London’s old city, Clayton Hotel London Wall features a variety of stylish rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi, a modern gym and everything you need on your doorstep. Each room includes a flat screen TV, super king-size beds and a luxury en suite with Antipodes organic toiletries. Make yourself at home with the Nespresso coffee machine, and, if that’s not enough, connect your phone to the Bowers & Wilkins Wireless Bluetooth Speaker to listen to music while you’re getting dressed up or winding down. Some rooms have a private balcony overlooking the city (subject to availability). Cots and highchairs are available on request. Perfect for foodies, Clayton Bar & Restaurant serves up dishes in art deco surroundings. Dine here to discover dishes that’ll send your taste buds soaring, and, if on the occasion you’d like to eat out, Old Spitalfields Market and the vibrant suburb of Shoreditch are less than a mile away.
