Feel well-connected with 3 tube stations and Liverpool Street Station nearby, perfect for getting to Westminster, the West End, and beyond. Find yourself surrounded by London’s greatest attractions including St Paul’s Cathedral and the iconic London Bridge.

name: Copthorne Tara Hotel London Kensington
description: Located in Central London, this 4-star hotel is a five-minute stroll from Kensington High Street. It also offers complimentary Wi-Fi. This contemporary hotel provides a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and an express check-in and check-out feature. Corporate amenities include a business centre. The rooms are air conditioned and include an in-room safe, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. They each have heating, a desk and ironing facilities. Copthorne Tara Hotel London Kensington boasts convenient dining options, such as Asian and Chinese dishes at Bugis Street Brasserie and British meals at The Brasserie Restaurant and Bar. Places to dine at the hotel include Tara Tea Lounge and Artist's Corner. Copthorne Tara Hotel in London is within walking distance of Kensington Palace, the Baden-Powell House and Royal Albert Hall. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Gloucester Road Tube Station and Earl's Court Tube Station, which allows convenient access in and around London.Revato

name: Hilton London Wembley
description: A landmark property, Hilton London Wembley is situated directly opposite the iconic Wembley Stadium and next to the historic OVO Arena, at the same time only 5 minutes’ walk from Wembley Park tube station, and 20 minutes from London’s city center theater district in the West End. All of the tastefully decorated Guest Rooms and Suites in this London hotel feature large windows, an LCD TV and a work area with ergonomic desk chairs. Upgrade to an Executive Room to enjoy exclusive access to the Executive Lounge on the top floor, with complimentary breakfast and evening canapes. Hold a conference in one of 10 meeting rooms or book our Grand Ballroom for up to 700 guests. The hotel features a 24-hour business center with the latest in audio-visual equipment, and WiFi access is available throughout. Enjoy delicious cocktails at our Sky Bar & Roof Terrace and savor international and local specialties in our all-day dining restaurant. Work out in the 24-hour Fitness Center by Precor, cool down with a dip in the 12m indoor pool or unwind in the sauna and steam room. With 200 car park spaces on site, this hotel is the ideal point from which to explore greater London and its surroundings. Visit Windsor Castle, the races at Ascot or take a day trip to historic Oxford. Heathrow Airport is only a 45 minute drive away.Hilton

name: Hotel Saint
description: Featuring a Roof Terrace and views of city, Hotel Saint London is a 4-star hotel set in London, an 8-minute walk from Sky Garden. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a business centre, along with free Wi-Fi throughout the property. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. All rooms feature a wardrobe. Hotel Saint London offers a terrace and extra facilities including a 24-hour gym, 4 meeting rooms, 2 restaurants and Jin Bo Law Sky bar – a rooftop bar in the City of London where guests can experience views of London's skyline.

name: Lancaster Hall Hotel
description: Attractively situated in London, Lancaster Hall Hotel features a continental breakfast and free WiFi. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. Madame Tussauds is 2.4 km away and Portobello Road Market is 2.5 km from the hotel. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath and a hairdryer. Guest rooms have a safety deposit box. The hotel can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near Lancaster Hall Hotel include Paddington Station, The Serpentine and Royal Albert Hall. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Sonder Camden Road
description: Come to Camden Road for the eclectic thrift stores, independent boutiques, and mouth-watering local street food. Stay for the warm community atmosphere and serene Sonder experience. Bright and welcoming spaces are the perfect place to recharge for your London stay. In the quaint and well-loved Camden neighborhood, a vibrant art scene awaits. Experience a fringe show at The Pleasance Theatre or some live music and improv at The Lord Stanley gastropub. Make your way to Camden Town for more nightlife options or hop on the Tube to explore the rest of the big city. Wherever the day takes you, end your night right with a book and warm drink in one of Camden Road’s modernly playful spaces, each complete with the style and comfort you need to hit the markets and cafes again tomorrow. A space that works for you High-rises. Low-rises. Hidden neighborhoods and buzzing downtowns. With contact-free check-in and 24/7 digital support, everything you need for a perfect stay is just a tap away. We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary. Home Truths Daily housekeeping is available for an additional fee. There are no laundry facilities or elevators.VRBO

name: The Rosebery Aparthotel
description: Situated in Central London, The Rosebery by Supercity Aparthotels offers apartments and suites with free WiFi, a fully-fitted kitchen and air-conditioning. The suites receive a service clean once per week. A king-size bed is featured in each bedroom, while the kitchen includes an oven/microwave, washing machine and dishwasher. An iPod dock is also provided as well as a full selection of cutlery, crockery and glassware. Executive 1 bedroom apartments and all 2 bedroom apartments come with Chromecast TV. London’s West End, Piccadilly Circus and Covent Garden can all be reached within 20-minute bus rides, with the bus stop just a minute’s walk from the property. King’s Cross/St Pancras station and St Paul’s Cathedral are both within 20 minutes’ walk.

name: Henrys Townhouse Marylebone
description: No description found

name: Fitzrovia Hotel
description: In the heart of London's West End, this impressive Georgian building is now a 4-star Fitzrovia hotel. Fitzrovia Hotel is a short walk from Oxford Street and Oxford Circus. Regent’s Park can be reached in around 10 minutes’ walk. Two Tube stations are within easy walking distance. Each spacious, airy room at Fitzrovia Hotel features a digital LCD TV and free WiFi is available. Guests can enjoy tea and coffee-making facilities, and 24-hour room service. The elegant XX-XXVIII Restaurant offers a superb menu, while Omega Lounge Bar serves afternoon tea and cocktails.

name: City Sleeper at Royal National Hotel
description: Near The British Museum A stay at City Sleeper at Royal National Hotel places you in the heart of London, within a 15-minute walk of The British Museum and Oxford Street. This 4-star hotel is 1.5 mi (2.5 km) from Trafalgar Square and 1.7 mi (2.7 km) from Piccadilly Circus. Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Russell Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi The British Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi Theatreland - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Oxford Street - 1 km / 0.6 mi The Harry Potter Shop at Platform 9 3/4 - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Palace Theatre London - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi Royal Opera House - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi Theatre Royal Drury Lane - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi Covent Garden Market - 1.7 km / 1 mi Oxford Circus - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi London Palladium Theatre - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi The Strand - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi Leicester Square - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi Piccadilly - 2 km / 1.2 mi Trafalgar Square - 2 km / 1.3 mi The nearest airports are: Heathrow Airport (LHR) - 29.4 km / 18.3 mi London City Airport (LCY) - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi Gatwick Airport (LGW) - 105.7 km / 65.7 mi Luton Airport (LTN) - 54 km / 33.6 mi Stansted Airport (STN) - 58 km / 36 mi Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Stay in one of 272 guestrooms featuring plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and electric kettles.Ticket Package

name: The Brent Hotel
address: 165 Preston Hill, Harrow, Middlesex - London, Harrow, HA3 9UY
description: The Brent Hotel - London - Wembley and Harrow has 14 rooms and is set in a quiet location, a 45-minute tube ride from central London. It has free parking. The nearest Tube station is Preston Road. The Brent Hotel - London - Wembley and Harrow is only 30 minutes’ drive from Heathrow Airport and less than 10 minutes' taxi journey from Wembley Stadium. The rooms are decorated in neutral colours. They have a TV and tea/coffee making facilities. A continental breakfast is available for a surcharge of GBP 7.50 per person. The hotel has a spacious dining room, and WiFi is available at an additional cost. The hotel is a 5-minute walk to Preston Road and the Kingsbury area, which offer cafés, restaurants, health clubs and shops.

name: London Lodge Hotel
description: Located in Kensington, just 15 minutes’ walk from Hyde Park, London Lodge offers elegant rooms with satellite TV. Earl’s Court Underground Station is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel. All public areas and rooms have complimentary WiFi access. The famous shops of Knightsbridge can be reached after a 25-minute walk. Both The Natural History Museum and the Victoria and Albert Museum are 15 minutes’ walk away. Holland Park is just a 5-minute walk away. Private bathrooms are included in each classically furnished room, along with a hairdryer. Guests can make use of the writing desk, minibar, and individually controlled heating and air conditioning. Stephanie’s Café Bar features its own patio and entrance onto Lexham Gardens. Guests can enjoy full English breakfasts at a surcharge; a simple menu and a selection of drinks are available in the café bar.

name: Club Quarters Hotel Covent Garden Holborn
description: Just 300 metres from Holborn Underground Station, this hotel has an outdoor terrace which overlooks Lincoln's Inn Fields. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel, and each en suite room includes a desk with ergonomic chair and an iPod dock. The Royal Opera House is within 10 minutes’ walk of Lincoln's Inn Fields, as is Covent Garden, with its shops, restaurants and famous market. The British Museum is 800 metres away and London’s Theatreland can be reached after a 15-minute walk. Guests can socialise in the Club Living Room, which has a business centre area with printing facilities. There is an on-site fitness centre and guests can have some equipment delivered to their room. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are included in each modern, private bathroom. Rooms also have a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe, desk and tea and coffee making facilities.

name: Thistle Bloomsbury Park
description: Within 20 minutes' stroll from Euston Bus Station, Thistle Bloomsbury Park offers guests a convenient base while in London. Those staying at the property can also make use of free Wi-Fi access during their stay. This modern hotel offers meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and 24-hour room service. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. The rooms at Thistle Bloomsbury Park have a coffee maker, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. Each provide an in-room safe, a seating area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Serving European cuisine, Bloomsbury Kitchen provides a modern setting for an enjoyable meal. Situated in Central London, Thistle Bloomsbury Park is surrounded by a wealth of shopping, nightlife, and eateries, making it the perfect base when on holiday. Central Saint Giles and the British Museum are a short walk away.Revato

name: Hyatt Place London City East
address: Black Lion House, 45 Whitechapel Road, London, E1 1DU
description: Hyatt Place London City East is situated in London, 600 metres from Brick Lane. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has family rooms. Boasting a rooftop bar called Pocketsquare with an outside terrace and views of London. At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. We do offer a breakfast to go each morning at Hyatt Place London City East. The accommodation offers rooms with a terrace and balcony. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Popular points of interest near Hyatt Place London City East include Tower of London, Spitalfields Market, Sky Garden and Tower Bridge. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Limehouse Library Hotel
description: Limehouse Library Hotel features a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in London. The property is around 1.8 km from Canary Wharf Underground Station, 3.1 km from Canada Water and 3.2 km from Tower of London. The hotel has family rooms. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also have free WiFi, while some rooms come with a city view. At Limehouse Library Hotel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or halal breakfast is available every morning at the property. Speaking English and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Brick Lane is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Tower Bridge is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 7 km from Limehouse Library Hotel.

name: Crowne Plaza London - Kings Cross
description: Experience an upscale London hotel designed to flow between local experiences and business. Located near St Pancras International Station, and Farringdon Station, Crowne Plaza® London - Kings Cross is a short walk to the Eurostar trains, Elizabeth Line, and London Underground at Russell Square and King's Cross St. Pancras to Heathrow Airport (LHR). Walk out to discover our trendy King’s Cross neighborhood with restaurants, shops, entertainment, and attractions such as the British Museum, and Covent Garden. Plan a meeting or gathering in our flexible events space. Catch up over cocktails and conversation at the Bloom Bar and Lounge. Get a great night’s sleep in sophisticated guest rooms with contemporary décor. Connect, unplug, or explore your way.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Bankside Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: Bankside, an independent hotel set on the culturally vibrant South Bank London, is a social hub for anyone with a passion for culture, art and food. This intimate hotel, with 161 bedrooms including seven suites, feels like home thanks to the use of hand-picked furnishings, specially commissioned artworks and friendly, intelligent service.Lines are blurred between work and play, with social spaces providing an inspirational environment for a dynamic guest experience. These include Art Yard Bar & Kitchen, a library and an outside terrace. There are four meeting & event spaces including Whitebox; a blank canvas for guests to create their own setting. Located across from the City, just a four-minute walk to Southwark and Blackfriars stations, where tube lines offer easy access across the capital. Waterloo station is less than 10 mins walk. Nearby are Tate Modern, Shakespeare’s Globe and the National Theatre, Borough Market is also close, as are some of the capital’s top foodie restaurants.Marriott

name: The Gyle
description: Well situated in the centre of London, The Gyle offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a bar. The property is situated 1.6 km from British Museum, 2.5 km from Dominion Theatre and 2.6 km from Tottenham Court Road. The property is non-smoking and is set 200 metres from King's Cross St Pancras. At the hotel, every room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms include a safety deposit box, while certain rooms will provide you with a terrace and others also provide guests with garden views. The Gyle offers a continental or Italian breakfast. Staff at the accommodation are always available to provide information at the reception. Popular points of interest near The Gyle include King's Cross Station, Euston Station and King's Cross Theatre. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: The Savoy
description: The Savoy has been at the forefront of the luxury hotel scene for over 130 years. The hotel 267 rooms and suites celebrate The Savoy dual historical influence with either Edwardian or art deco design, and guests of suites are looked after by the Savoy Butlers. Within The Savoy, guests will also find some of the most well-known restaurants and bars in London. With exceptional service at the heart of everything, a Savoy experience is built on memories created and stories told across the generationsaccorhotels.com

name: Angel Townhouse
description: Set in the Islington district in London, Angel Townhouse offers 3-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is situated 3.3 km from Emirates Stadium, 3.5 km from King's Cross Theatre and 3.7 km from Euston Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.2 km from King's Cross Station. The units feature a private bathroom, bathrobes and bed linen. St Paul's Cathedral is 4.2 km from the hotel, while British Museum is 4.3 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 15 km from Angel Townhouse.

name: The Kensington Hotel
address: 109-113 Queen's Gate, South Kensington, London, SW7 5LP
description: The luxurious Kensington Hotel is situated in the heart of South Kensington and within a 20-minute stroll of Harrods, Harvey Nichols and The Royal Albert Hall. The Natural History Museum and The V&A are just 5 minutes on foot. A state-of-the-art fitness room is provided for exclusive use of the hotel’s guests. Free WiFi, luxury bed linen and a large flat-screen TV are included in each room at The Kensington Hotel, as well as an en suite bathroom. The Town House Bar & Restaurant has a magnificent lounge area with period drawing rooms. Its setting offers a blend of traditional and contemporary features, and is an ideal location for for afternoon tea, lunch or evening dinners. South Kensington tube station is only 450 metres away and offers direct access to the heart of the West End & Heathrow Airport.

name: Batty Langley's
description: Situated just a 7-minute walk from London Liverpool Street Station, Batty Langley's features beautiful rooms with antique furniture, heavy silk curtains and quirky bathrooms. Located in a cobbled street in London's trendy Spitalfields, the iconic Gherkin building is 13 minutes' stroll away and Old Spitalfields Market is a 3-minute walk away. Each unique bedroom has air conditioning and a Smart TV with media hub, and complimentary WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Breakfast is served in the guests' bedroom or can be taken in one of the beautiful public rooms on the ground floor such as the Tapestry Room with its sunny, private courtyard. The breakfast menu features freshly-baked croissants and the famous Brick Lane beigels as well as delicious smoothies. There is an honesty bar where guests can pour themselves a drink, and a 24-hour room service menu. The hotel is 1.1 miles from the Barbican Centre, 9 minutes' walk from The Brick Lane Gallery and 20 minutes' journey on foot from the Tower of London. Tower Bridge is also 1.2 miles away. A tea or coffee tray is provided on arrival.

name: Ten Manchester Street
description: In elegant Marylebone, the 4-star Ten Manchester Street Hotel features luxury rooms and a cigar terrace with free Wi-Fi. Lively Oxford Street and Bond Street are a 10-minute walk away, and Marylebone high-street just around the corner. The boutique bedrooms have modern bathrooms with rain showers and fluffy robes. All rooms feature a large flat-screen TV with SKY channels, air conditioning and a minibar. No. Ten’s in-house restaurant, Dieci is serving modern Italian cuisine. Open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, Dieci’s laid back lounge atmosphere offers the perfect place to rewind and enjoy a selection of rare fine wines, many of which are available by the glass alongside a fresh antipasti platter, or to compliment dishes from the Head Chef’s favourite, seasonal dishes. One of the finest cigar venues in London, Cigars at No. Ten offers an unsurpassed range of hand-rolled Havana cigars. Be spoilt for choice with the fine selection and sample cigars in the indoor tasting room, before making your choice of single stick or box to purchase. All Havana’s are meticulously maintained by a dedicated Cigar Team, who house them in a bespoke humidor, ensuring that your chosen cigar arrives in complete optimum condition. Guests can sample fine, hand-rolled cigars on the terrace or in the cigar lounge. In the heart of Marylebone Ten Manchester Street is a 5-minute walk from Baker Street Underground Station. Covent Garden is 1.5 miles away, and Piccadilly Circus is a 20-minute walk.

name: The Chamberlain
description: Just north of Tower Bridge, this friendly and comfortable hotel is near to the Tower of London, Tower Bridge, the 'Gherkin', the river and St Katharine Docks. Free WiFi is available throughout. Many of London's world-famous sights are within walking distance, and there is good access to the business district. Liverpool Street Station is a short walk away. All rooms feature en-suite facilities, flat-screen TV, desk and tea/coffee making facilities. The Chamberlain has a modern but welcoming sense of style, as well as a refined restaurant and pub-style bar for fine dining, superior ale and relaxation. During lunch and in the evenings, the restaurant is a more formal alternative to the relaxed surroundings of the bar.

name: The Pilgrm
description: Rooms Stay in one of 73 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and portable fans, and housekeeping is provided once per stay. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and coffee/tea in a common area. Property Location With a stay at The Pilgrm Hotel, you'll be centrally located in London, a 1-minute drive from Hyde Park and 5 minutes from Oxford Street. This hotel is 2.5 mi (4 km) from Piccadilly Circus and 2.5 mi (4 km) from Buckingham Palace. Dining Enjoy a meal at The Lounge or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to noon for a fee. name: Rochester Hotel By Blue Orchid
description: In a tranquil location, this sophisticated 4-star hotel offers free WiFi and overlooks leafy Vincent Square. Victoria’s rail and Tube stations can be reached in 10 minutes’ walk. Rochester Hotel by Blue Orchid is also within walking distance of Buckingham Palace and Westminster Abbey. Each room has a digital LCD TV and a marble bathroom. Many rooms have balconies and terraces. Guests can dine at The Pavillion, a classic French restaurant. Lord's Lounge Bar serves cocktails and afternoon tea. The Rochester and Wellington have a number of shared facilities including; restaurants, bars, gardens, and gymnasium. Guests are welcome to utilise all services and facilities at both hotels. Address: 71 Vincent Square, London SW1P 2PA Tel: 020 7834 4740

name: Andaz London Liverpool Street - a concept by Hyatt
description: Located next to Liverpool Street Station and adjacent to Shoreditch, the five-star hotel Andaz London Liverpool Street boasts 267 stylish guest rooms and suites, 7 restaurants and bars, free WiFi, a 24-hour health club and complimentary wine and canapes in the lobby during the evening. The spacious and modern rooms have a flat-screen TV, luxurious Yukata bathrobes with REN toiletries, free non-alcoholic minibar with juices and snacks Dining options range from casual dining in Eastway brasserie to traditional English pub food in Lady Abercorn's Pub & Kitchen, to authentic Japanese cuisine in Miyako. Guests can also enjoy all-day dining and drinks in Rake's Café Bar. Andaz London Liverpool Street is just 1 mile from The Tower of London and St Paul's Cathedral, and bordering vibrant and creative Shoreditch with its array of boutiques, markets and nightlife hotspots. It offers easy access to central London with famous Oxford Street only a short 7-min Tube ride away.

name: St. Ermin's Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: Inspired by England's indelible history and informed by its dynamic present, St. Ermin's Hotel, Autograph Collection is a luxury destination amid the best of central London. Immerse yourself in stylish comfort in 4-star accommodations with contemporary amenities, premium bath products and high-speed Wi-Fi. Discover some of the world's most celebrated attractions, including Westminster Abbey, Big Ben and Buckingham Palace. Host flawless corporate events and elegant social engagements in sophisticated event spaces, enhanced by expert planners and custom catering. Punctuate your day by exploring the dramatic elements of our historic grounds and beautifully manicured courtyard. Or, savor delectable British fare at our Caxton Bar and Grill, and sip fine wines and creative cocktails at our stylish bar. A distinctive haven of modern comfort, our hotel provides distinguished luxury that captures London's historic essence.Marriott

name: Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport
address: The Grove, Bath Road, West Drayton, UB7 0DG
description: Offering a convenient base for guests wishing to experience London's well-known nightlife, the hotel features a 24-hour reception and views of London Heathrow Airport. Those staying at the property can also enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi. This elegant hotel offers meeting rooms, an express check-in and check-out feature and a concierge. Airport transfers, a laundry service, a dry cleaning service and a wake-up service are available upon enquiry. Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport provides 351 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Also included in the rooms are a hairdryer, an in-room safe and an ironing board. Guests of Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport can relax at the in-house bar, ideally based for socialising in the evening. For guests who enjoy exploring local dining options, there is a wide range within walking distance. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has a comfortable visit.Revato

name: The Gantry London, Curio Collection By Hilton
description: Discover, explore, stay. East London's latest design hotel with the highest rooftop bar in the area, restaurants, cocktail lounge, gym, market deli, and 291 bedrooms and suites. The hotel is based in Stratford, an exciting and rapidly evolving neighborhood in the ever-changing creative and culturally rich East London. Guests are exposed to cultural attractions including art, design, music, dining, and nightlife. The Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, Westfield shopping centre, West Ham, and Hackney Wick are all on the doorstep. Easily connected so guests can enjoy the local area and central London: moments from Stratford International station, just 6 minutes from King's Cross St Pancras, and 17 minutes from London City Airport. The striking building design has an iconic façade made up of copper-coloured fins, some up to 9 m. tall, that wrap the building in soft curves, enveloping outside spaces to create more intimate dining, drinking, and partying spaces. Inside, the interior plays on contrast through combining raw industrial materials with luxurious ones, and diverse art from both emerging and established artists from London and further afield. More than a place to rest your head. A place to stay extraordinary.Hilton

name: Native Bankside
description: Providing a fitness centre, Native Bankside is set in London, not far from Borough Market and London Bridge. Complimentary WiFi is provided. All apartments come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and kettle. Sky Garden and Tower of London are 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 12 km from the property.

name: The Westbridge Hotel
description: The Westbridge Hotel is a 4-star hotel within a Grade-II listed building dating back to 18th century. There is a restaurant serving breakfast and refreshments throughout the day and a guest lounge. There are 80 rooms with free WiFi, individually controlled air conditioning and private bathrooms with walk-in showers. The rooms also have hairdryers, flat-screen Smart TVs, telephones, refrigerators, safes, irons, and tea/coffee making facilities. All rooms have an alarm clock with USB charging ports. Westbridge Lounge is open 24 hours a day and offers daily newspapers, magazines and books to keep you occupied. There are 2 computers and a printer available to use free of charge. The Westbridge Hotel is just 5 minutes' walk from Stratford Underground Station and 2 minutes' walk from Stratford High Street DLR, offering direct services to Canary Wharf and London’s West End. The hotel is just an 11-minute walk from Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park and Westfield Stratford City.

name: The Henrietta Hotel
description: The Henrietta Hotel is located in London, a 2-minute walk from Savoy Theatre, and features free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk and are equipped with a private bathroom and free toiletries. The units in The Henrietta Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hair dryer. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. At The Henrietta Hotel you will also find a restaurant serving European cuisine. Royal Opera House is 300 metres from the hotel, while Arts Theatre is 300 metres from the property. London City Airport is 12 km away.

name: Holiday Inn London - Kensington High St.
description: The stylish Holiday Inn London Kensington High Street is located in a quiet spot close to the shops of Kensington High Street just a few minutes walk from the nearest tube underground station. Following an extensive multi million pound refurbishment the hotel offers 706 modern guest rooms all equipped with high speed WiFi Internet connection along with a host of other modern amenities and features stylishly and thoughtfully designed, Located in the back of the hotel a stunning private garden awaits you. Or enjoy our Health Club which has a full length swimming pool Whirlpool sauna steam room treatment rooms and a fully equipped gym. Kensington Health Club and Spa provides a great contrast from the hustle and bustle of the city by providing our guests with a luxurious tranquil retreat. We can provide you with an escape from the stress of everyday life and give you your own space where you can listen to your body and indulge accordingly in the great facilities it has to offer. Swimming pool and gym are complimentary and Spa packages are available.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection
description: Inspired by the ancient Greek concept of hospitality, our 4-star Hotel Xenia, Autograph Collection welcomes guests to the centre of Kensington, one of London's most cherished neighbourhood. The hotel is a boutique retreat in the centre of it all, replete with 4-star accommodations, two bars and fine dining at La Terrazza. Easily walk from our prime location to some of the area's most famous historic attractions, including Hyde Park, Royal Albert Hall, Kensington Palace, Knightsbridge and Kensington High Street. After exploring London's iconic destinations, relax with a glass of wine on our outdoor heated terrace or dine in our award-winning restaurant, showcasing innovative Italian fare. Retreat to luxury accommodations and sleek, modern bathrooms. If visiting our boutique hotel for event planning reasons, take advantage of our sophisticated venues, enhanced by gracious service and culinary expertise.Marriott

name: Buckle Street Studios By Locke
description: Offering accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and flat-screen TV, Buckle Street Studios by Locke is set 1.4 km from Tower of London and 1 km from Brick Lane. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Tower Bridge, Sky Garden and Liverpool Street Underground Station. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 10 km from Buckle Street Studios by Locke.

name: The Montcalm at the Brewery London City
description: In the heart of London City district, this 5-star hotel offers luxury rooms with stylish bathrooms and iPod docks. The Barbican Train and Underground Station is less than a 10 minute walk away. Modern rooms at Montcalm feature flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Luxury toiletries, bathrobes and large-head showers feature in each black-tiled bathroom. Some rooms also boast marble bathrooms or hand-woven wool carpets. Montcalm London City's restaurant serves a seasonal menu with local produce in a chic setting. King’s Head gastro pub offers cask ales, fine wines, and relaxed dining. Traditional afternoon tea and pastries can also be enjoyed in the hotel’s lounges. The Barbican Center and Barbican Cinema are very nearby, less than a one-minute walk.

name: The Ned
description: Set in the former Midland Bank building in the City of London, just steps from Bank Station, The Ned hosts 250 bedrooms, ten restaurants and a range of men’s and women’s grooming services. The Grade I-listed building was designed by Sir Edwin 'Ned' Lutyens in 1924. Each bedroom at The Ned features elements of design back to the 1920's and 1930’s and includes vintage pieces, patterned furnishings and rainforest showers. The former Grand Banking Hall is host to restaurants which serve a wide range of cuisines, from Britain to Northern Italy, North America to Asia. Six private hire rooms and two terraces are at guests’ disposal. They all have a reception area. Ned’s Club Spa offers a variety of treatments – from manicures and pedicures, to massages and hair services. The private member's spaces, Ned's Club Gym and Ned's Club Spa pool may be accessed through purchasing day passes, subject to availability. The property is within a short walk from St. Paul’s Cathedral and within 15 minutes from Oxford Street and the West End, by tube. Bank Station also offers a direct DLR connection to London City Airport, which can be reached in 30 minutes.

name: Olympic House Hotel
description: Offering accommodation in London, Olympic House Hotel is just a 9 minute walk from Hyde Park and a 30 minute walk from Madame Tussauds, the Royal Albert Hall and Oxford Street. Each room features an en-suite bathroom and is equipped with a flat-screen TV, free toiletries and a hair dryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Lord's Cricket Ground is a 25 minute walk away from Olympic House Hotel, while Notting Hill is a 35 minute walk. The nearest airport is London City Airport and is 11.5 miles from Olympic House Hotel.

name: Royal Eagle Hotel
description: Royal Eagle Hotel boasts grand Victorian architecture and is located within a 3-minute walk from Paddington Train Station, providing easy access to the Heathrow Express 15-minute airport service. The shops and amenities of Oxford Street can be reached in just 20 minutes’ walk or 10 minutes by Tube. Royal Eagle has a cosy lounge area for guests to enjoy, and a 24-hour reception. Each room has a TV, and a modern en suite bathroom. Guests can also enjoy a continental breakfast, served in the charming and spacious eating area. The property is within a short walk from transport links leading to the main landmarks of London.

name: Nomad London
description: Situated in the centre of Covent Garden adjacent to the Royal Opera House, NoMad London takes residence in the historic Bow Street Magistrates' Court Building. NoMad London's 91 rooms and suites offer hardwood floors, a custom art program and clawfoot tubs in many suites. The property features several dining and drinking spaces. The NoMad Restaurant is set inside an atrium with a soaring glass ceiling, the space is flooded with natural light providing energy and liveliness during the day. In the evening, the restaurant transforms to a more intimate setting, revealing its moody and sensual character. Side Hustle offers casual dining and drinks in a lively setting, with a menu influenced by the flavors of Mexico and an extensive collection of agave-based spirits. The Library is the living room of the hotel, reserved exclusively for hotel guests and their visitors. Guests are encouraged to explore the bookshelves, lined with a collection focused on the arts, culture and history of London and New York. Common Decency is an intimate subterranean bar with a cocktail program from the brand’s award winning bar team, with a focus upon hyper-seasonality, community and a sense of place. Common Decency will offer forward-thinking, avant-garde cocktails, served alongside modern riffs on classics with a whimsical twist. The property features a fitness centre. The property offers à la carte breakfast in the restaurant, library or in the room. Theatre Royal Drury Lane is 90 metres from the accommodation, while Covent Garden is 100 metres away. London City Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: Novotel London Waterloo
description: Novotel London Waterloo Hotel is within walking distance of the Thames, Big Ben and Buckingham Palace - making it the ideal stay for families. Make the most of this central London location by requesting a room with views of London's breathtaking skyline. After a busy day you'll want to unwind in our modern hotel gym, complete with a saunarium.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Express London - Excel
description: Holiday Inn Express London - ExCeL hotel is conveniently located in the heart of East London with excellent transport links to Canary Wharf and London attractions perfectly suited for business or leisure stays. This stunning property boasts 204 bedrooms and three meeting rooms. Every guest staying will receive a complimentary buffet breakfast as part of their stay, and our restaurant offers a 24 hour menu as well as alfresco dining on our hotel terrace. The hotel is just a stone’s throw away from the iconic ExCeL centre, within walking distance to London City Airport and extremely close to the Docklands Light Railway - Royal Albert station. This station is perfectly located in the heart of everything East London has to offer, with direct links to The Excel, Canary Wharf, London City Airport, and Canning Town Underground Stations. Custom House station is two stops away on the Docklands Light Railway and is the main station for the Excel Centre. Room types to choose from are in the Standard category, with options of double room offering a Queen bed, a twin room with two separate single beds, a family room consisting of a double and sofa bed allowing up to two adults and two children under 12 to stay included, and accessible double rooms for guests requiring a wheelchair or step free access.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: ibis London Sutton Point
description: The ibis London Sutton Point is perfectly located in the heart of Sutton, Surrey. Designed with comfort and enjoyment at its heart, guests can enjoy new Plaza concept bedrooms, which have been considerately designed by FGMF architects. With everything you need to enjoy a comfortable stay, you are sure to feel at home from the moment you arrive. Guests are also welcome to relax in Charlie s Corner, a cosy yet sophisticated spot perfect for enjoying a morning coffee or craft beer and music in the evening.accorhotels.com

name: Mermaid Suite Hotel
description: With its own restaurant, the Mermaid Suite Hotel is situated just off Oxford Street, in the heart of the fashionable West End. The hotel is made of separate buildings which are located next to each other. Bedrooms offer an en suite bathroom, tea/coffee making facilities and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. The hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from both Bond Street and Oxford Circus Underground Stations. London's famous tourist attractions are few minutes' walk away, or a short journey by bus or Tube. The spacious restaurant is open for lunch and dinner from 12:00 to 22:30 every day, and offers guests a discount.

name: Mondrian London Shoreditch
description: The Mondrian London Shoreditch is a unique five-star hotel located in the heart of Shoreditch, London's creative and cultural hub. As well as its vibrant and convenient location, this Mondrian hotel boasts 120 stylish guest rooms and suites, a rooftop pool, lounge, 24-hour gym, spa treatment rooms, and a co-working space. Hungry? The new Mondrian Shoreditch offers several signature food and drink brands, including a culinary experience, BIBO Shoreditch, by world-famous Spanish chef Dani García.accorhotels.com

name: The Red Lion Hotel
description: Ideally situated, 16th-century The Red Lion Hotel has excellent access to central London, via nearby Uxbridge & Hillingdon underground stations and is only 6.4 km from Heathrow Airport. Charming period features include exposed timber beams and a large Tudor fireplace. The Red Lion overlooks Hillingdon Hill and boasts a welcoming restaurant, large patio area and garden. The Red Lion has offers stylish and well furnished en suite rooms, with satellite TV. Nearby attractions such as Windsor, Legoland, Wembley and Thorpe Park are a short drive away. The hotel is minutes' away from major motorway access on the M4, M25 and M40.

name: Park Grand London Heathrow
description: Less than 20 minutes' stroll from Hounslow Central Tube Station, Park Grand London Heathrow Gateway offers guests an ideal base while in London. The multiple amenities this modern hotel offers include free Wi-Fi, a concierge and meeting rooms. This 4-star hotel provides room service, a 24-hour reception and luggage storage. Guests can also enjoy on-site parking. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. Bathrooms are equipped with necessities like a hair dryer and bathrobes. Park Grand London Heathrow Gateway is within walking distance of Hounslow East Tube Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. London Heathrow Airport is within a 15-minute drive.Revato

name: Islington Inn
description: Islington Inn is in North East London and just a 20-minute walk from Highbury & Islington Tube Station. It has en suite rooms with an oriental design and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Islington Inn feature a TV and have canopied beds and sari-style curtains. They also include hairdryers and tea and coffee-making facilities. The hotel is convenient for all London’s major attractions, with central London just 10 minutes away on the Tube. The Emirates Stadium is a 28-minute walk away from the hotel.

name: Mercure London Hyde Park Hotel
description: This boutique hotel has recently undergone a major upgrade and boasts 72 well-appointed guest bedrooms with Victorian style windows, high ceilings and a warm town house feel. Tucked away in a peaceful and tranquil garden square, the hotel perfectly encapsulates traditional English charm but with a modern twist. Each room is brimming with technology including a voice-controlled AI concierge providing entertainment, property services and room service. Guests also enjoy an on-site bar, restaurant and gym.accorhotels.com

name: Kings Cross Inn Hotel
description: Situated opposite Kings Cross/St Pancras Rail Station, Kings Cross Inn Hotel provides easy access to the international Eurostar service, National Rail and the London underground. Central London, the British Museum and Madame Tussauds are all within 10 minutes via public transport. Each air-conditioned room at Kings Cross Inn features an en suite bathroom, flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some have a view of the Victorian Gothic St. Pancras building. The picturesque Regents Park is only a 30-minute walk and features an open-air theatre and London Zoo. London’s West End is just 1.5 miles away and can be reached in just over 10 minutes by tube.

name: Sydney House Chelsea
description: Sydney House Chelsea is a Grade II listed Georgian building, situated between Fulham Road and King's Road. A 3-minute walk from South Kensington Underground Station, it offers an AA-awarded breakfast and free Wi-Fi. Each bright room features a flat-screen TV. Each also has a stylish bathroom, with either a bath tub or a shower. L'Occitane toiletries are provided. A 24-hour room service menu is available. Local attractions include Kensington Gardens and Hyde Park, which can be reached in around 20 minutes’ walk. Harrods and Harvey Nichols can also be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

name: The Hoxton Southwark
description: The hotel is located in Southwark, a short walk from The Shard, Tate Modern and Shakespears Globe. Less than 5 minute walk to Southwark Station for the Jubilee line and a 7 minute taxi journey to Waterloo Station. The hotel has bedrooms cleverly designed to maximise comfort, with everything guests need and nothing that they dont. There are five different room categories and all the guests receive, a free hour of phone calls and free water.iHotelier/iStay

name: citizenM London Victoria Station
description: No description found

name: Park Plaza Victoria London
description: Park Plaza Victoria Hotel features an Italian restaurant, stylish cocktail bar and modern bedrooms. Situated in lively Victoria, the hotel is a 2-minute walk from Victoria Station, and a 5-minute' walk from Buckingham Palace. The spacious bedrooms at the contemporary Park Plaza Victoria London have air conditioning and flat-screen TVs with on-demand movies. All rooms feature work desks and complimentary WiFi access. The Park Plaza Leisure Club features a sauna and steam room. There is also a fully equipped gym that guests can use. TOZI is a vibrant Italian restaurant and bar specialising in Venetian cicchetti, meaning small plates, and classic Italian cocktails. The Lounge Bar serves drinks, bar snacks and coffees throughout the day and evening. The hotel is centrally located, within a mile of Parliament Square, Westminster Abbey and Big Ben.

name: The Judd Hotel
description: Set in a Georgian crescent, The Judd Hotel offers guests traditionally styled rooms with modern amenities. The hotel is within a 10-minute walk to Euston station, and King’s Cross station. The bedrooms feature an en suite bathroom, air conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. Housed in 2 elegant town houses, The Judd Hotel overlooks gardens and tennis courts, which guests may use. Guests may be allocated a room in the Judd Hotel annex which is directly opposite the Judd Hotel. The hotel reception and breakfast room is located in the Judd Hotel. The Judd Hotel is a 20-minute walk from Regent’s Park, and guests can reach Oxford Street in 10 minutes via public transport. The West End is 20 minutes from the property, where guests will find theatres and a multitude of shops and restaurants.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott London Tower Bridge
description: Inspired by multi-functional urban apartments, Residence Inn by Marriott London Tower Bridge welcomes you to discover contemporary comfort living in London. Before an eventful day full of sightseeing or meetings, get a great night's sleep in one of our 101 apartment-style suites. Prepare a mouthwatering meal for your family, colleagues or even your pet in a fully equipped kitchen and relish it in a cosy living area. Make the most of the complimentary breakfast after burning off some calories at our 24-hour state-of-the-art fitness centre. Use the 24-hour laundry facility for your laundry and let our team pick grocery for you. The hotel is well located near prominent destinations like Bermondsey, The iconic Tower Bridge, London Bridge, The Shard, Borough Market, Southbank and is conveniently accessible to Baker Street, City of London, Canary Wharf and more. Book your London stay today!Marriott

name: 100 Queen's Gate Hotel London, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Boasting a prime location in the prestigious Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea, 100 Queen's Gate Hotel London, Curio Collection by Hilton, is on the doorstep of iconic cultural attractions including the Royal Albert Hall, Natural History Museum, Science Museum, and Victoria & Albert Museum. Enjoy a leisurely stroll from our historic, Victorian-style hotel to Harrods, Notting Hill, Kensington Palace, Hyde Park and the designer boutiques of Knightsbridge. Following a multimillion-pound refurbishment, guest rooms and suites at our Kensington hotel exude elegance and feature complimentary WiFi, electronic newspapers, 49-inch flat-screen HDTVs with Chromecast, and bathroom amenities by Floris London. Unwind in a stylish Deluxe or Luxury bedroom with upgraded amenities and additional space. For a unique experience, select a two-level Duplex suite, boasting a top-floor location. Enjoy a workout in our state-of-the-art gymnasium or host a small meeting in one of two elegant boardrooms. Enjoy classic Italian cuisine at our signature restaurant Cento, or unwind with a late-night drink in our concept cocktail bar ESQ. For a traditional Botanical Afternoon Tea or pre-theater drinks in a sophisticated atrium setting, visit Botanica. 100 Queen's Gate Hotel London offers 24-hour room service so you can dine in the comfort of your room or suite, day or night.Hilton

name: The Victoria
description: The Victoria is located in Richmond and is within 15 minutes’ walk of the beautiful Richmond Park and North Sheen Station. This elegant hotel has a restaurant, a traditional pub and a garden. Each stylish room at The Victoria has free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, tv and coffee facilities. The award-winning restaurant offers creative British cuisine and serves brunch on Saturdays. The banks of the River Thames are a 20-minute stroll away. The centre of Richmond and the famous Kew Gardens are within 1.5 miles of the hotel. You can reach central London in approximately 30 minutes by Tube and train.

name: The Crown London
description: Experience the best of the city from a stylish corner of the capital at The Crown London. With excellent transport links to the West End, Wembley Stadium and Brent Cross Shopping Centre, Cricklewood will spoil you for choice when building the perfect minibreak – if you can tear yourself away from our grade II listed hotel. Inside, our modern bedrooms are designed with comfort in mind, spacious and stylish, and the perfect sanctuary from the buzz of city life. If there's anything we can do to make your stay more memorable, just ask – our friendly team will be happy to help. Impressive on-site facilities mean you can fill your plate in a relaxed restaurant and raise your heart rate in a well-equipped gym, all in the same Victorian hotel. The Crown London is the perfect spot for your next big meeting too. Invite your colleagues and clients to a venue with outstanding architecture, modern facilities, and attentive customer service. You may request early check-in or late check-out at an additional 10GBP fee.bestwestern.com

name: The Hide London
description: Located just 2 minutes' walk from Hendon Central Tube Station, The Hide London offers free onsite parking and free WiFi. This boutique 4-star hotel is a 10-minute drive from the famous Wembley Stadium. Each elegant air-conditioned room features a satellite TV, a mini-fridge, and tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms also have iPod docking stations. The sleek en-suite bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer. In the mornings, The Hide London provides serves continental breakfast in the chic dining room. For lunch and evening meals, guests will find many restaurants and cafes within a 5-minute walk. Brent Cross Shopping Centre is a 15-minute walk from The Hide London. Home to top attractions, the city centre of London can reached after a 50-minute Tube journey. With prior arrangement, the hotel can arrange taxis to or from any London airport at competitive prices.

name: The Pillar Hotel
description: Located 800 metres from Hendon Central station, The Pillar Hotel is a grade II listed building discreetly nestled amongst 2 acres of land and surrounds a grassy quadrangle. This boutique hotel offers free broadband internet and free parking. The hotel is modelled on the celebrated 15th Century Almshouses of Ewelme, Oxfordshire, and combines the traditional charm of a Victorian estate with contemporary 21st Century design. A continental breakfast is served in the elegant hotel lobby. Rooms at the Pillar are styled in a contemporary manner and all feature a modern en suite bathroom featuring a heated towel rail. They are all equipped with a 32-inch LCD TV with satellite channels. The suite features a kitchenette with a microwave. The start of the M1 Motorway is just a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Hendon Central Tube Station is less than 10 minutes' walk away and offers access to central London is just 20 minutes. Middlesex University is also just a 15-minute walk away and the Brent Cross Shopping Centre is less than 1 mile from the hotel. Nearby attractions include Hampstead Heath, Middlesex University, Kenwood House, RAF Museum, Alexandra Palace and Allianz Park, home to Saracens Rugby Club. Wembley Stadium and Arena are a 15-minute drive from the hotel. In front of the Pillar there is a 24h public bus stop to and from the Stadium.

name: Astors Belgravia
description: In the heart of lively Victoria, Astors Belgravia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Victoria Train station and a 4 minute walk from Victoria Coach Station. The traditional hotel has a 24-hour front desk and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The bright and airy bedrooms each have a luxurious modern bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms feature a work desk and a TV with cable channels. Continental Bed and Breakfast is available with our Bed and Breakfast rates which can be taken in the Breakfast area. Continental Breakfast includes items such as a selection of pastries, fruit, yoghurt, juices and hot beverages. Astors Belgravia is just a 10 minute walk from Knightsbridge. Westminster Abbey and the Houses of Parliament are within a 20 minute walk.

name: The Rookery
address: 12 Peters Lane Cowcross Street, London, EC1M 6DS
description: Set in central London's fashionable Clerkenwell area, The Rookery offers charming rooms with elegant period furnishings and free WiFi. Only 100 metres from Farringdon Railway Station, the small hotel is also just 5 minutes' walk from Barbican Tube Station. With sumptuous antique furniture and artwork, each individually styled and air-conditioned room offers a flat-screen LCD TV. The luxury en-suite bathrooms boast land&water toiletries and a hairdryer. In the mornings, guests at The Rookery can enjoy breakfast in the elegant conservatory or served to the privacy of the room. Breakfast includes freshly baked croissants. For lunch and evening meals, there is a room service menu as well as a wide range of restaurants and bars in the immediate area. Set within a row of 18th-century houses, The Rookery still retains many original features. Guests can relax in the library or in front of an open fire in the oak-panelled lounge. By Smithfield Market and on the outskirts of London's financial Square Mile, The Rookery is just over 1 mile from South Bank’s Tate Modern gallery. Impressive St. Paul's Cathedral is only half a mile away.

name: Marlin Waterloo
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Marlin Waterloo offers accommodation in London. Buckingham Palace is 2 km from the property. The property offers kitchen and laundry facilities, as well as an on site gym. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. London Eye is 600 metres from Marlin Waterloo, while Houses of Parliament is 800 metres away. Lambeth North Tube station is a 1-minute walk from the property, while Waterloo Tube station can be reached in 10-minutes walk. London City Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: My Place Hotel
description: My Place Hotel is an elegant Victorian town house situated in a tranquil Kensington street. It is just a 1-minute walk from Earl's Court Underground Station and its direct Heathrow Airport link. All comfortable rooms have en suite facilities, a fridge and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a separate seating area with a sofa. An inclusive continental breakfast is available each morning. Complimentary tea and coffee is available to hotel guests from 11am until 10pm daily. The hotel also has a spacious lounge with an all-day bar, and an attractive walled garden with a seating area. The hotel is just a stones throw away from the many vibrant bars, restaurants and shops that Earls Court has to offer, while Kensington High street is a short walk from the hotel. You will also find Kensington Palace, the Royal Albert Hall and Holland Park just a leisurely stroll from the hotel. The hotel also has a spacious private function room, overlooking the hotel gardens.

name: Nobu Hotel London Portman Square
description: Set in London’s West End, this modern hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Oxford Street and Hyde Park featuring 249 guest rooms and suites. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, world class dining experiences such as Nobu Restaurant, Nobu Bar & Terrace, plus the relaxed restaurant and bar, The Lounge. We welcome you to our luxurious and ultra-zen Nobu Wellness & Fitness, offering a range of Grown Alchemist treatments, and the world’s first Nobu Pilates Reformer studio. Each room at Nobu Hotel London Portman Square is perfect for an overnight stay in the city; individually designed, featuring comfortable bedding, flat-screen TVs, minibars and a 24-hour room service menu, whether in a suite with spacious living areas overlooking the London skyline or in a contemporary yet cosy space/bedroom. Each bedroom takes its conceptual cues from the traditional English garden within the adjacent Portman Square, drawing on the natural materials, textures and tranquillity of this urban oasis. Marble Arch Tube Station is just a 5-minute walk away and provides excellent access to the rest of London.

name: The Hadley Hotel
description: Around 12 miles from central London, The Hadley Hotel in Barnet offers accommodation within 15 minutes’ walk of High Barnet Tube Station. The Hadley Hotel offers en suite rooms with free parking and Wi-Fi. Each guest room has a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee facilities and free fibre optic Wi-Fi access. All rooms have an en suite shower with hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. On the ground floor you will find the Hadley Bar and Restaurant, serving a range of drinks and a fused grill menu for lunch and dinner. A full cooked breakfast menu is available daily. Guests will find a beauty salon on the lower ground level of the property, offering a large range of treatments and massage services. Barnet is close to a number of towns in the Greater London and Hertfordshire areas, with Potters Bar an 8-minute drive away. Elstree, Borehamwood, Edgware and Enfield are all around 15 minutes from The Hadley Hotel.

name: Club Quarters Hotel London City
description: This exclusive 4-star hotel is in the City, London's historic financial centre. It has free WiFi and air-conditioned rooms in 4 different sizes. Both Monument and Bank London underground stations are 400 metres away. Club Quarters, Gracechurch is next to Leadenhall Market, in one of the oldest parts of London. It is 500 metres from the River Thames and London Bridge. The City's banks, businesses and shops are a short walk away. Guests have free use of the Club Lounge, a social/business lounge area with computers, wireless printing, complimentary coffee/tea and newspapers, as well as a fitness centre, and free chilled, purified bottled water. Each stylish room has bedside charging points, multi-purpose work spaces with task lighting. Gaucho Argentinian Steakhouse serves breakfast, lunch and dinner 7 days a week.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Heathrow Airport
description: DoubleTree by Hilton London Heathrow Airport offers perfect rooms for all travelers flying to or from Heathrow as well as staying on business. Located off the A4 Bath Road, we're three miles from Heathrow Airport Terminals 2 and 3. Heathrow Hoppa bus is available on a schedule. Situated on the Piccadilly line, Hatton Cross and Hounslow west tube Stations are 1.2 miles from the hotel and offer direct service to central London in around 30 minutes. Feel at home in a comfortable, air-conditioned guest room including complimentary WiFi, a well-lit work area and flat-screen TV with Freeview channels. Stay productive in the 24-hour business center and plan an event for up to 70 people in one of the 6 meeting rooms with natural daylight. Energize with the latest exercise equipment in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center. Unwind with a drink in the relaxed sports bar, before enjoying a meal in the Touchdown restaurant. Grab a Starbucks coffee from our all-day lounge or dine in the comfort of your room with our 24-hour room service. Food and beverage discounts for government and public sector workers make dining at the DoubleTree by Hilton London Heathrow value for the money. The hotel is close to Stockley Park, Bedfont Lakes and Uxbridge business parks and ideally located for Rolls-Royce, Gate Gourmet, IBM and SAP.Hilton

name: Queensway Hotel, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western
description: A convenient Central London base near Hyde Park. Occupying an elegant tree-lined road in a leafy part of Paddington, Queensway Hotel, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western boasts a fantastic location in the heart of London, ideal for business travellers, sightseers and shoppers alike. It’s only a 3-minute walk from Paddington Station, so getting around the capital is a breeze. Comfortable and affordable, the hotel has a 24-hour front desk and 40 bedrooms that include singles, doubles, twins and triple rooms. Enjoy home comforts, including a flat-screen Freeview TV, hairdryer, tea and coffee-making facilities, in-room safe and free Wi-Fi. Business travellers will also appreciate the handy desk and direct-dial telephone with voice messaging service. Being in such a fabulous central location, you’re close to a wealth of top attractions at Queensway Hotel, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western. Walk to Hyde Park, Kensington Gardens, Little Venice and the iconic shopping destination of Oxford Street. Or catch the Tube to Buckingham Palace and fashionable Knightsbridge where Harrods and Harvey Nichols are situated. From Paddington Station, you can also reach Heathrow Airport in just 15 minutes via the Heathrow Express train if you have a plane to catch.bestwestern.com

name: Marlin Aldgate Tower Bridge
description: No description found

name: Warren House
address: Warren Road, Kingston upon Thames, KT2 7HY
description: A 5-minute walk from Richmond Park, Warren House is a stunning Victorian mansion complete with private gardens. Located 10 miles from Central London'and 6 miles from Twickenham stadium, Warren House boasts a range of amenities and services available for guests. During the warmer months, garden games including croquet are provided in the idyllic grounds. Each room is elegantly furnished and has a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a Bose CD music system. Most rooms are based in the main building while others are adjacent. There are several private rooms that guests may dine in. The cuisine features local and organic produce, some taken from the orchards and meadows in the grounds. A 19th-century Grade II Listed building, Warren House is also a perfect venue for conferences, meetings and events. Hampton Court is 7 km from the property. Reservations for overnight accommodations do not include rights to use the rooms, property or grounds for professional photography of any kind. For commercial photography requests, please contact this property directly. Breaching these terms will result in legal action being taken.

name: Hotel Indigo London - Kensington
description: The Hotel Indigo® London Kensington is situated in the heart of the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea, our London hotel blends beautifully into this boutique neighbourhood. We’re also located close to the Earl’s Court tube station, placing all of London’s destinations and major transport hubs like Heathrow (LHR) and London City Airports (LCY) within easy reach.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Jumeirah Lowndes Hotel
description: In exclusive Belgravia, this luxury 5-star hotel offers a sophisticated bar and free Wi-Fi, a short walk from Harvey Nichols. Tube stations are a 5-minute walk away. Each stylish room and suite at Jumeirah Lowndes has luxurious beds and satellite TV. Some rooms have an iPod dock and a sumptuous seating area. Modern British cuisine is served at Lowndes Bar & Kitchen. Victoria Station is a 10-minute walk away, offering access to the Gatwick Express airport service.

name: OYO The Arch, Wembly Stadium
description: Located a short walk from Wembley Central Station, OYO The Arch Wembly Stadium provides guests with a convenient base while in London. It also provides free Wi-Fi, luggage storage and a terrace. There are 13 rooms at the hotel, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries in addition to a shower. OYO The Arch Wembly Stadium houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax at the end of the day. London's attractions, such as Wembley Arena and Wembley Stadium, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. Wembley Stadium Railway Station is within a two-minute walk, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Zedwell Piccadilly Circus
description: Located in London’s West End, Zedwell Piccadilly Circus boasts over 700 windowless rooms in Piccadilly Circus. The hotel, housed in the famous London Trocadero is designed to focus on rest and relaxation. Each room built to remove distractions that disturb sleep such as windows, complicated technology and anxiety inducing controls. Rooms are fully air-conditioned with air purification technology, high-speed WiFi and en-suite shower rooms. Popular points of interest near Zedwell Piccadilly Circus include Trafalgar Square, Regent Street, Leicester Square, Soho and Piccadilly Circus.

name: 54 Queen's Gate Hotel
description: 54 Queen’s Gate is set in the heart of South Kensington in London, just a 7-minute walk from the borders of Hyde Park. A Grade-II Edwardian townhouse featuring 24 bedrooms, a vibrant bar and private terrace, the property has benefited from a substantial refurbishment in 2018. Guest rooms have been inspired by a range of famous Londoners. The hotel’s dining options have been expanded significantly. Hyde Park, Kensington Palace, The Natural History and the V&A Museums are all just a short walk away. The property is located alongside an array of cafes, bars and restaurants, as well as designer shopping in Knightsbridge and the world-famous Harrods. South Kensington Tube Station is just 700 metres away.

name: London Queen's Eurostar - Kings Cross
description: No description found

description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 36 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Athena places you in the heart of London, within a 15-minute walk of Hyde Park and Oxford Street. This hotel is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Marble Arch and 2.4 mi (3.9 km) from Piccadilly Circus. Dining Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 9:00 AM for a fee.
