name: Sheraton Heathrow Hotel
description: Looking for a place to stay while travelling from Heathrow Terminals? Sheraton Heathrow Hotel is the perfect home away from home with stunning nearby attractions including the historic Windsor Castle. 428 comfortable, modern bedrooms and suites feature the signature Sheraton Sleep Experience Bed, specially designed to provide a new level of comfort for a good night's sleep when you are away from home. Work out at our 24-hour state-of-the-art gym or hop on the train or bus into London to see the sights. In addition to being just moments from Heathrow Airport, the hotel is convenient to many of London's most celebrated attractions, such as Windsor Castle, Twickenham Stadium and Legoland. Our new Cast Iron Bar & Grill is warm and welcoming, serving Great British and delicious seasonal dishes for you to enjoy. The Lobby Bar, located in the heart of the hotel, offers alongside handmade pizzas, fine wines and refreshing cocktails a relaxing atmosphere perfect for you to unwind during your travels.Marriott

name: ibis Styles London Southwark - near Borough Market
description: In London's thriving South Bank area, the ibis Styles London Southwark - near Borough Market is less than 200 metres from the Thames and the Tate Modern. It offers free WiFi and air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms. The ibis Styles London Southwark - near Borough Market hotel has a superb location, just a few hundred metres from Shakespeare's Globe Theatre. The London Eye, Tower Bridge and the Tower of London are less than a mile away. London Bridge Tube Station just 0.5 miles from the hotel, giving excellent access to the rest of London. All of the rooms have a laptop-size safe a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The spacious suites each have an additional lounge/seating area. The restaurant and bar offer snacks and a range of drinks, including bottled beer and a gin bar.

name: Balham Lodge
description: No description found

name: DoubleTree by Hilton London - Marble Arch
description: The Doubletree by Hilton London Marble Arch is located in the heart of the West End just off Oxford Street and close to all the main attractions and business districts of London. Our full service Hotel offers a contemporary ambiance and attentive friendly service. Our tastefully appointed hotel features modern facilities suited to the business traveler, along with a fantastic location to please our Leisure guests. Spacious guestrooms and suites boast a long list of guest amenities, generous work space, and luxurious beds. For your convenience, WiFi is available in the public areas of the Hotel. Our guests have full use of our many amenities including a well equipped fitness center. Jogging paths and Tennis are available nearby. Relax in our inviting lobby lounge – Indigo or dine at our casual Fire and Spice Restaurant. The Doubletree by Hilton London Marble Arch offers flexible meeting and events facilities, housed in the most historical part of the building with its ornate high ceilings and large windows the magnificent Bryanston Suite is the perfect backdrop for any occasion. Staying at the Hotel places you close to all the major attractions of London and Commercial centers. Whether business, vacation or a weekend away the Doubletree Marble Arch we look forward to you with our signature, warm Doubletree Chocolate Chip Cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: London Marriott Hotel Maida Vale
address: Plaza Parade, Maida Vale, London, NW6 5RP
description: Experience the charm of Maida Vale, our premium hotel is conveniently connected to the city centre with Wembley Stadium and Lord’s Cricket Ground nearby. Enjoy easy access to the centre of London and the famous Abbey Road Studios. Surrounded by legendary attractions, London Marriott Hotel Maida Vale is a stylish fixture on the North West London cityscape. Relax in our newly refurbished rooms and suites, offering large walk-in showers, Wi-Fi access, onsite hotel parking and original artwork celebrating the local culture. Treat yourself to distinctive Italian cuisine at our hotel restaurant and host flawless business gatherings and social affairs in our 4,542 square feet of well-lit venue space, including six renovated meeting spaces. After a day of work, shopping or sightseeing, relax or network in our Executive Lounge or exhilarate your body with complimentary access to the adjoining Bannatyne's Health Club. Turn new experiences into lasting memories at London Marriott Hotel Maida Vale.Marriott

name: Coulsdon Manor Hotel and Golf Club
description: Set in 140 acres of landscaped parkland, it is the tranquillity of Coulsdon Manor Hotel and Golf Club that allows you to forget you are just 15 miles from the centre of London. The estate boasts a wonderful collection of rare trees gathered from all over the world by the Byron family. Originally built in 1850, the Manor House has been tastefully restored to its former glory. The beautiful country house retains many original features from the open fire place to the glass atrium giving a light and airy feel to the Hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: Assembly Covent Garden
description: Situated within 200 metres of Arts Theatre and 300 metres of Prince Of Wales Theatre, Assembly Covent Garden offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in London. The property is located 300 metres from Charing Cross Road and a 3-minute walk from Trafalgar Square. Each room features a walk-in power shower and free WiFi. Shaftesbury Avenue is 300 metres from the hotel. London City Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: St Paul's Hotel
description: Offering a restaurant and free WiFi access, St Paul Hotel is a stylish boutique hotel just 5 minutes’ walk from Hammersmith Tube Station and Kensington Olympia Exhibition Centre. Formerly a school, this 19th century building was built by the same architect as the National History Museum. All the rooms at St Paul Hotel are elegantly decorated, and feature tea/coffee making facilities, an en suite bathroom, bathrobes and free toiletries. Other amenities include a satellite TV, a mini bar, a hairdryer and a safe. Melody, the onsite restaurant, provides a creative British menu and an extensive wine list. Guests can also enjoy informal lunches and snacks in the lounge bar, with elegant and romantic surroundings. This 4-stars hotel has an interesting story, being the base from where Winston Churchill planned the D Day Landings during the World War II, back in 1944. Both Barons Court and West Kensington Tube Stations are a 10-minute walk away. The emblematic Hyde Park and Kensington Gardens are just 10 minutes’ away by bus.

name: Holiday Inn London - Bloomsbury
description: A stylish central London hotel with a restaurant, excellent meeting facilities and free Wi-Fi Holiday Inn® London - Bloomsbury hotel is moments from Russell Square Tube station on the Piccadilly Line. It's close to major transport hubs – Kings Cross St Pancras station and Euston station are both less than a mile away, reachable in five minutes by bus or taxi. You can drive to Heathrow Airport (LHR) in 40 minutes. You can grab a bargain in the shops on vibrant Oxford Street, 10 minutes' taxi ride from the hotel. Marvel at the British Museum's treasure trove of global culture less than half a mile away. Catch the tube to Leicester Square, 11 minutes away, to see a show or go bar hopping in the West End. Get up close to penguins, tigers and gorillas at London Zoo, 10 minutes' cab ride from the hotel. If you're hosting a conference, a wedding or a party, the hotel's Academy Conference and Training Suites can accommodate up to 300 guests. There's a dedicated host to help ensure your event goes smoothly, video conferencing facilities and included refreshments. You can enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner at the Junction Restaurant, and relax with a Starbucks coffee or a pint in the Junction Bar. Watch live sports or enjoy a hearty pub meal at Callaghan’s Bar, which has an outdoor terrace too. Kids stay and eat free.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Nox Edgware Road
description: NOX Edgware Road is set in the Westminster Borough district of London, less than 1 km from Lord's Cricket Ground and a 14-minute walk from Paddington Station. Complimentary WiFi is featuredthroughout the property. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchenette features a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. Kitchenware is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Madame Tussauds is 1.6 km from the aparthotel, while The Serpentine is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 18 km from NOX Edgware Road.

name: Morton Hotel
description: Attractively set in the centre of London, Morton Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle and an iPod docking station. Rooms come with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms are equipped with a kitchenette. The rooms in Morton Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Euston Station, British Museum and King's Cross St Pancras. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 14 km from Morton Hotel.

name: Good Hotel London
description: Good Hotel London is a profit for non-profit floating hotel with a waterfront location and rooftop terrace offering panoramic views. It is located within a 10-minute walk from the ExCeL Convention Centre and 1.8 miles from London City Airport and Canary Wharf. All rooms offer modern decor, with both custom-made and design furniture. The rooms offer water or city views, en suite bathrooms with showers, fluffy down pillows, in-room safes, tea making facilities, work desks and free WiFi. Guests are welcome to use the shared guest lounge, which offers the opportunity to meet and interact with other guests. Locally sourced food and drinks are served all day in The Living Room. The on-site coffee corner serves crafted espresso drinks and a variety of healthy refreshments to stay or takeaway. The Rooftop terrace is an open-air cafe overlooking the city of London and river Thames (weather permitting). There is 24-hour front desk and concierge services. Good Hotel is a social business initiative which re-invests all their profits to train long-term unemployed local people in London and educate disadvantaged children in Guatemala. By staying at Good Hotel, you are helping the local community to maintain these programs.

name: Park Avenue Baker Street
description: Bordering Regent's Park and 100 metres outside of London's Congestion Charge Zone, Park Avenue Baker Street offers free Wi-Fi and renovated rooms. The Marylebone and Baker Street underground Stations are less than a 5-minute walk away. A flat-screen TV with Freeview channels is standard in each of the light and modern rooms at Park Avenue. Each bathroom is tiled in Italian porcelain and comes with a shower. The 24-hour reception staff can recommend various pubs and restaurants in the surrounding area. The hotel is located less than 500 metres from Madame Tussaud’s wax museum. Lord's Cricket Ground and the shops of Oxford Street are a 20-minute walk away.

name: Holiday Inn London - Regent's Park
description: A modern hotel near central London's attractions, with free Wi-Fi and smart event facilities. Holiday Inn® London - Regent's Park hotel offers easy access to central London's major attractions, with Great Portland Street and Regent's Park Tube stations just a few minutes away. The hotel is near A501 and a 45-minute drive from Heathrow Airport. You can head to the leafy grounds of Regent's Park or hit the shops on buzzy Oxford Street, both an easy walk from the hotel. Family-friendly attractions like Madame Tussauds, the Sherlock Holmes Museum & London Zoo are all a stone's throw from the hotel. You can discover ancient treasures and learn about cultures from around the world at the British Museum, less than a mile away, or see an exhibition at the British Library. Theatre lovers can reach the West End in 15 minutes on foot, along with the bars & restaurants of vibrant Soho. Planning your next training day or conference? The Academy is a modern events centre fitted with the latest technology and high-speed Wi-Fi. There's a dedicated reception and banquet kitchen, plus an operations team to help plan your event. Training packages are available. Unwind and choose from our extensive rate of wine, beers and spirits on our comfortable range of seating. Chill or catch up on the day’s emails with complimentary WiFi. Afterwards, tuck into hearty meals in the newly renovated open lobby. Kids Stay and Eat Free.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Georgian House Hotel
description: The Georgian House Hotel is 800 metres from London Victoria Station. This unique, award-winning property was built in 1851 and offers the charm of an English country hotel in the city. This property features beautifully and individually styled rooms with modern comforts. Some feature a bath and others have rainfall showers. Some rooms and the Westminster Apartments are located in different buildings. The hotel has lovely original features, including ornate fireplaces and cornicing. All rooms have large flat screen TVs with over 30 channels, a choice of delicious refreshments and The White Company toiletries. Free WiFi is available throughout. Georgian House serves a continental breakfast between 7.00-10.00 am during weekdays and 7.30-10.00 am during Saturday, Sunday and bank holidays, with the option to pay for cooked items and a delicious wizard themed afternoon tea on Saturday and Sunday. Georgian House Hotel offers meeting facilities in the Cubitt Room. Hyde Park is less than 2 miles away and the nearest tube stops, Pimlico and Sloane Square, are a 10-minute walk away. The Georgian House Hotel is less than a mile from Buckingham Palace, the Houses of Parliament and the shops of the King's Road.

name: Mercure London Paddington Hotel
description: The 4-star Mercure London Paddington hotel blends contemporary design with the convenience of being in central London. Located next to Paddington station, this stylish hotel offers state-of-the-art facilities to help make your stay a welcome one. Its serene setting offers a contrast to the hustle and bustle of the city, with each room providing guests with the comforts of home and more. The hotel comes equipped with a 24-hour gym, while the on-site restaurant serves food and drinks all day.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton London Heathrow Airport
description: Hilton London Heathrow Airport is well connected to transport hubs, with direct access into Heathrow Airport’s Terminal 4 via a covered walkway. The hotel is located less than 15 minutes from Heathrow Terminals 2, 3, and 5, and our guest service team will be happy to assist with your connection. Paddington Station in Central London is 30 minutes away via Heathrow Express. Windsor Castle, and LEGOLAND® Windsor Resort are within 12 miles of our door. With 398 guest rooms, which includes executive rooms and stylish suites for the ultimate in luxury, the hotel also offers guests a whole host of amenities. Along with an onsite gym, fitness lovers can take advantage of the running and walking trails in the parklands around the hotel, or enjoy a meal, snack, or drink in one of the three OXBO dining experiences, which are available from early morning until late at night. The hotel boasts an OXBO Café, OXBO Bar, and OXBO Kitchen, each offering their own distinct menu – but all offering responsibly sourced, comforting, and generous dishes. The hotel has extensive conference, events, and meeting facilities, with 15 meeting rooms which can easily accommodate numbers from one to 300. The event spaces include the Concorde Atrium, with floor to ceiling windows, allowing natural light to infiltrate the space with a fantastic view over the hotel pond. It can easily accommodate up to 140 people and is versatile enough to accommodate everything from a drinks reception to a product launch. As an unexpected feature at an airport hotel, the Concorde Atrium space conveniently leads directly to the outside beach terrace, an unexpected quiet space to get some fresh air during breaks, host a casual drinks reception, or partake in a team activity. This area is completely separate to the Concorde Suite and can be booked privately.Hilton

name: The Columbia
description: The Columbia Hotel offers independent, family-run accommodation in London. It is a 5-minute walk to Lancaster Gate Tube station. The property offers view of Hyde Park and Kensington Gardens. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Rooms include a private bathroom with a bath and a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The bar and lounge serves food and drinks. Free WiFi is provided in the public areas of the property. We are currently only serving Continental breakfast To Go. Hyde Park is 900 metres from Columbia Hotel, while Royal Albert Hall is 1.2 km away. Marble Arch can be reached in a 20-minute walk. It is an 11-minute walk to Paddington rail station. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 16 km from Columbia Hotel.

name: 69Thegrove
description: Set in London, Greater London region, 69TheGrove is located 1.7 km from Houses of Parliament. The property is situated 1.7 km from Westminster Abbey. The property is 1.8 km from Big Ben and 2 km from London Eye. All rooms in the bed and breakfast have tea/coffee making facilities and a hairdryer. Each room has an en-suite bathroom with free toiletries. Complimentary WiFi is offered in the rooms. Guests at 69TheGrove can enjoy a cooked English breakfast from Monday-Saturday. A continental breakfast is served on Sunday's. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Kx Rooms Kings Cross
description: Located in London and with King's Cross St Pancras reachable within 200 metres, KX Rooms Kings Cross provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is situated 2.4 km from Dominion Theatre, 2.5 km from Tottenham Court Road and 2.9 km from Royal Opera House. The property is 2.5 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Euston Station. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at KX Rooms Kings Cross have a city view. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at KX Rooms Kings Cross can access a business centre and meeting rooms. Speaking Greek, English, French and Hindi, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the hotel include King's Cross Station, King's Cross Theatre and British Museum. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 15 km from KX Rooms Kings Cross.
